The guards drag me to the feet of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s bed. While [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s appetite is yet to return, the leeching seems to have stabilized [From.GetHerHis] condition. Some malicious courtiers have spread the rumor that the constant bloodletting is sucking away all humanity from my patient, but I doubt any of it is true.

I look at the tumid leeches over my arm, feeling the bad blood being sucked out of me. My body may be weak, but I have never achieved such clarity of mind before. So many of the worries and attachments that bothered me in the past have now become inconsequential, and I am free to act however necessary to achieve my goals.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is such a frail and gentle creature. Even the simplest actions are hard for her to perform. The more I see [From.GetHerHim], the more I am convinced that it is my duty as [From.GetHerHis] vassal to protect [From.GetHerHim] from harm.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] was touched by my concern, but [From.GetSheHe] decided to politely decline my offer of assistance, assuring me that [From.GetSheHe] is perfectly capable of handling [From.GetHerselfHimself] and that it would be immodest for me to be so close to [From.GetHerHim].

My spouse [FromFrom.GetFirstName] spends too much time with [From.GetTitledFirstName]. The unthinkable has happened. [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has permanently silenced [FromFrom.GetHerHis] wife, just like I ordered. I never realized I could exploit my weakened condition to manipulate people to such an extent...
It has just come to my attention that one of the bards under my patronage has just written a not too flattering song mocking [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s wide girth.

The unthinkable has happened: [From.GetTitledFirstName] was so furious of the bard's song that [From.GetSheHe] had the man roasted on the spot as punishment. I never imagined my liege could be such a cruel and ruthless [From.GetManWoman]...

A young woman has caught my eye this evening. Not only is she beautiful, she claims to be an important emissary from a foreign realm, with years of diplomatic experience. After exchanging a few pleasantries, she shared her desire to spend some time alone with me.

I cannot believe it! The woman I slept with was a servant of [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s! When I awoke after our night together she had disappeared, leaving only an ominous message telling me who her real master is. Even worse, I think that sleeping with him made me terribly sick.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is notorious for [From.GetHerHis] short temper. I am sure I can exploit [From.GetHerHis] lack of patience to my advantage in some way.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] was sacrificed to the cruel [FromFrom.Religion.GetName] gods! Accounts describe how [From.GetSheHe] was forcefully dragged screaming on top of a temple and torn apart by mad priests.

[From.GetSheHeCap] must lap up some of my immortal blood for protection.
Only I shall have this great power!

[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] swings [other_combatant.GetHerHis] [other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon] [other_combatant.GetClumsilyElegantly]. The fight has gone on forever, and my muscles are beginning to ache. With the remainder of my strength I [Root.GetKillingBlow].
My opponent seems to be getting tired, [other_combatant.GetHerHis] moves becoming slower. Strengthened by the cheers of the crowd, I [Root.GetKillingBlow].
I... yes, that was on purpose!
I am sorry it had to end this way.
Your death was the only logical outcome, [other_combatant.GetSisterBrother].

Just as I begin to think that I am wearing my opponent down, [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] lunges at me, with more force than so far displayed. Sweat drips down my forehead, when suddenly, I hear someone shouting, describing the scene incredulously. [other_combatant.GetSheHeCap] has managed to [Root.GetWeaponInjuringBlowOnMe].

Each blow of my weapon is becoming heavier, and I'm struggling to focus on my opponent, as the crowd cheers [other_combatant.GetHerHim] on. My vision is blurry when [other_combatant.GetSheHe] [other_combatant.GetKillingBlowOnMe].
Still shivering, I cannot explain what happened. When it all came down to it, my legs gave way and I simply... I fled the duel! I am such a coward..! Why did I ever agree to this in the first place?
I should have stayed and fought!
I just wanted to prove that I am not afraid.
It was too much, how they were just... All looking at me.
[Root.GetFirstName], what is the MATTER with you?!
Just as I [other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow], [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] manages to [Root.GetWeaponInjuringBlowOnMe]. However, the crowd is chanting MY name!

Just as I [other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow], [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] manages to [Root.GetWeaponInjuringBlowOnMe]. Dizzy, I can just about make out the sounds of the crowd: it is not my name they are chanting.

[other_combatant.GetTitledName] has already managed to [Root.GetWeaponInjuringBlowOnMe], when something twisted passes over [other_combatant.GetHerHis] face. I barely register the glint of something metal in [other_combatant.GetHerHis] hand, before my throat is cut open, blood spraying on [other_combatant.GetHerHis] face. I try to ask why, but no words come out.

[other_combatant.GetTitledName] has already managed to [Root.GetWeaponInjuringBlowOnMe], when [other_combatant.GetSheHe] lets out an angry grunt. Before I know it, I am begging for mercy, but [other_combatant.GetSheHe] is beyond reasoning. The last thing I hear is the shocked gasp of the crowd, and a soft thud, which can only be my head hitting the ground.

As a servant [Root.GetBoyGirl] hands me a letter, I sigh. I've waited to hear from [From.GetFirstName] for what feels like ages, and every letter I receive in its stead feels like mockery. "What's this seal?" I mumble, suddenly curious. Soon, relief is washing over me. "[From.GetSheHeCap] wants to see me!" I laugh, and the servant smiles.

While awaiting news from [From.GetFirstName], I have tried occupying myself... I briefly entertained the idea of courting a visiting diplomat, but I quickly realized it was only because [From.GetHerHis] hair was the exact same shade of color as that of [From.GetFirstName]'s... It seems silly now, reading the heartfelt words my [From.GetLordLady] has sent me.
Telling the truth might be a winning strategy, after all...!
Oh, I look forward to my next dream about [From.GetHerHim]...!
The beautiful [From.GetManWoman] is encouraging me to stop hiding from my feelings...!
I've never met someone as kind as [From.GetSheHe].
[From.GetSheHeCap] wonders how I could ever have been jealous, when [From.GetHerHis] heart is mine.
[From.GetHerHisCap] words are inspiring! Oh, I will strive be more like [From.GetHerHim]...!
So I was not being delusional...!

My [GetMyChancellorName] [advisor_target.GetFirstName] clasps [advisor_target.GetHerHis] hands in a gesture of sympathy. "No, my [Root.GetLordLady], we have not received any word from [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Yes, I've made inquiries among the servants, and nobody has stolen any letters..." Avoiding [advisor_target.GetHerHis] gaze, I wave my hand dismissively. "I suppose that is a response in its own."
I will not give up on our love...!
We have an eager new recruit! I should let the [new_recruit.GetManWoman] know that [new_recruit.GetSheHe] needs prove [new_recruit.GetHerselfHimself] to [new_recruit.GetHerHis] new peers...
I'll put on my most intimidating face. Ahem.

[hero_character.GetTitledName] of [hero_character.Society.GetName] greets me with a brief nod. "Another recruit, huh? To join our ranks, you need to prove yourself, [Root.GetBoyGirl]", the [hero_character.GetManWoman] says gruffly, folding [hero_character.GetHerHis] arms across [hero_character.GetHerHis] chest. "You'd be fighting one of our own. Still interested, my [Root.GetLordLady]?"
I'll gladly fight to prove myself.
Actually, I would rather not bloody my knuckles.

[new_recruit.GetTitledFirstName] offered no protests when I explained our traditions, eyes all aglitter at the thought of an initiation duel. After some inquiry, [duel_target.GetTitledName] has kindly volunteered.

[new_recruit.GetTitledFirstName] listened while I explained our tradition of one-on-one duels, but then rolled [new_recruit.GetHerHis] eyes and walked off. "I would rather not get involved with barbarians."

Although I did not expect much, we were all stunned by the performance of [From.GetBestName] during [From.GetHerHis] initiation fight. It will be interesting to see what [From.GetSheHe] makes of [From.GetHerselfHimself], as a member of our ranks.

In spite of some bruises and mild injury, I was not alone in being satisfied with the skill displayed by [From.GetBestName]. While I am intrigued, only time will tell whether joining our ranks is the right path for the [From.GetAgeAdjective] [From.GetManWoman], or not.

[From.GetBestName] was rather seriously injured by [From.GetHerHis] opponent, [combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName]. I expected my [combatant_2.GetRootRelation] to get in a blow or two, but I am mildly surprised that [From.GetTitledFirstName] still wants to join our ranks.

Just as [combatant_2.GetTitledName] was about to show [From.GetTitledName] what sparring match should look like, the [From.GetAgeAdjective] [From.GetManWoman] dropped [From.GetHerHis] weapon and ran..
Now, that's what we want to see!
Another member, eh? What do you know!

To the COWARD [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
Needless to say, we are unimpressed by your behavior, and hope you do not seek us anytime soon, lest this offense escalates.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
I am as disappointed as you are.

"Not so fast", a voice whispers in my ear, as I'm preparing to turn in for the night. I turn around, but something stings my throat. A dagger? "We WILL duel, dear [Root.GetFirstName], do you understand? Nod if you understand." Panic pounding in my chest, I nod, carefully as to not hurt myself further. "Good", the [From.GetManWoman] says, and pulls away into the dark.
Is that you, [From.GetFirstName]? Oh, [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I don't have a choice...!
You gulp, as it seems you have no choice. You will duel §Y[From.GetTitledName]§!, in a few days time.\n

While attempting to talk some sense into [combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName], in regards to [combatant_2.GetHerHim] declining my duel, I have decided to sneak into [combatant_2.GetHerHis] [combatant_2.GetCapitalHolding]. Fidgeting with the dagger in my sleeve, I have a good feeling about this, when suddenly I hear people shouting. "Who goes there?" they demand, and I am surrounded by guards.
I, uhm... I'm here to... Inspect the... Facilities.
You make a hasty run for it, before anyone recognizes you. There will be no duel between you and §Y[combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
Having studied many a tome on the topic, as well as the practical application of it, I am already well-versed in strategic warfare... Perhaps it is time I focused on something else?

Having lost count of the [Root.GetRegionalBigAnimal] trophies which decorate the many walls of [Root.Capital.GetName], maybe I should spend some time on other pursuits befitting a member of [Root.Society.GetName]?
I should focus on personal combat.
I want to delve deeper into strategic thinking.
I shall spend more time outdoors, hunting!
On second thought, I like my current way of life.

My fellow members of [Root.Society.GetName] have long been wondering when I will choose a focus for my fighting talents. There are those who live for the art of dueling, while others prefer the more theoretic side of combat... Yet hunting is also a worthwhile pursuit.
I want to spend more time outdoors, hunting!
Then again, I like my current way of life.

I have studied my soldiers practicing their swordsmanship, and I am certain that some of them are becoming unsettled by the constant watch of their [Root.GetTitle]... Perhaps it is time I admit that I could use some guidance, when it comes to my own dueling? If nothing else, I could join their training...
I shall get [mentor_target.GetTitledFirstName] to teach me everything [mentor_target.GetSheHe] knows.
I will discreetly hire someone to instruct me.
I think I would rather go about this alone.

My [From.GetRootRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] has contacted me, asking for private lessons in the arts of one-on-one combat. "The [From.GetTitle] is likely to appreciate any guidance we offer, my [Root.GetLordLady]", the messenger says.
I'll of course personally set up [From.GetHerHis] training regime.
I will loan [From.GetHerHim] some of my best veterans to practice with.

When we started practicing together, I had a hard time imagining displaying the kind of expert confidence that [mentor_target.GetTitledFirstName] exudes on the battlefield. However, bolstered by [mentor_target.GetHerHis] training, I think I have truly found my calling.

The last time we spoke, [mentor_target.GetTitledFirstName] had only praise to offer me. It's an odd feeling that [mentor_target.GetSheHe] is not here to see me now. Letting out a sigh, I clear my mind, focusing on the feeling of my [Root.GetDuelWeapon] in my hand. It's so natural to me now, as if part of my body.

"Be careful where you point that thing!" a courtier cried out today, as I was sauntering back from yet another session at the training grounds, idly playing with the sword in my hand. The woman hurriedly corrected herself: "Of course, a master duelist such as yourself would know best, my [Root.GetLordLady]."
I'll always be grateful for your lessons, [mentor_target.GetFirstName].
Oh, a master, am I? Why, yes, I suppose I am!
It took time, but I suppose all that hard work has paid off...!

The stack of books in front of me is intimidating. My scholars tell me these are classics, for anyone interested in an introduction to strategic warfare. But I am [Root.GetTitledFirstName]! Surely, I do not need the basics? Should I not be out on the field, surveying the troops, first-hand?
There is value in the historical records.
I think I am more of a visual learner.

My commanders have come to request my advice on some exercises they are performing outside the [Root.GetCapitalHolding] walls. "We could really use that strategic mind of yours, [Root.GetMasterMistress]", they say. Startled, I realize that my studying has paid off, and my chest swells with pride. I then collect myself, nodding: "Of course, I'd be happy to help."
Typically, what you'll want to consider in a set-up like this...
Soon, you are talking and gesturing excitedly, receiving "Oohs" and "Aaahs" in an even distribution.\n

The experienced hunters I have spending time with seem quite pleased with my weapons skills, and are wondering what I would like to explore next. Poring over the maps of the area outside of [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName], my advisors suggest I learn more about the theory behind the tracking of various prey.
Oh, are these sketches of animal footprints? Tell me more!
What about the actual capturing...? Let's talk more about that!

We have been tracking a wild [Root.GetRegionalBigAnimal] for hours, when a growl sounds in the bushes next to us. A thunk, followed by a soft groan, tells me that my arrow has found its target. Relaxing my posture, I realize that the hunt is over. "They should be calling you [Root.GetTitledFirstName] the Hunter!" one of my companions laughs. I smile.
I can't believe I wasn't always like this.
Thank you, [fellow_member.GetFirstName]. That means a lot.
In your heart, you feel that [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] might frown upon your dedication to these people.\n\n

The world has reached boiling point. Intolerance is on the rise, with conflicts of ideology and religious oppression rampant across the world. The many religious leaders congregate within their spheres, bent on having all others subjugate themselves before them. This is the era of large-scale religious wars.
The Era of Great Holy Wars has Begun\n

A wandering warrior has requested an audience. It appears as if the entire court is abuzz with stories of [invited_character.GetHerHis] exploits, this [invited_character.GetFirstNameWithNick] is seemingly of great renown. [invited_character.GetSheHeCap] wishes to swear fealty to me, having heard of my relation to the legendary [target_bloodline_founder.GetFullName]! I truly am blessed by my blood.

The blood of [target_bloodline_founder.GetFullName] flows through my veins. Since the days [target_bloodline_founder.GetSheHe] walked the earth we have abandoned our old [target_bloodline_founder.Religion.GetName] faith, though I do see merit in the ways that helped shape such a legend...
We were once like them, we should not judge their ways.
No, the ways of old belong in the past.
[target_bloodline_founder.Religion.GetHighGodName] speaks directly through my blood! I repent!

There are many legends about the great [target_bloodline_founder.GetManWoman] whose blood I share. A particular story has been circulating at court lately. It focuses on an epic feat where [target_bloodline_founder.GetFirstName] proves [target_bloodline_founder.GetHerHis] strength of character. The more I hear, the more I wish to emulate [target_bloodline_founder.GetHerHim]...
I shall strive to be more like [target_bloodline_founder.GetHerHim]!
No, I make my own fate.
I know EXACTLY what they are referring to!

Lying in the crib, I hear a slithering presence drawing closer and closer... What could this be, a friend? A foe? Before long, a hissing head peeks up over the edge. With glaring eyes and searching tongue, it moves towards me...
Grab it by the neck and squeeze it hard, until it stops moving!
You are cold, but here it is warm. Please, share my blanket.

As I check on little [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName], I am terrified to discover a snake in [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] crib! Fortunately the snake is dead, but who killed it? It surely could not have been [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName]? I better keep an eye out...
We need more guards in here!
Phew! At least [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] is not MY [child_of_destiny.GetDaughterSon].

As I check on little [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName], I am terrified to discover a snake in [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] crib! Fortunately the snake seems to be sleeping, cuddled up next to [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName]. I quickly have a guard dispose of the serpent, though how did it manage to get in there?
My child! No! You were destined for greatness...

As I check on little [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName], I am terrified to discover a snake in [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] crib! The serpent hisses at me, the body of little [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] lying next to it. [child_of_destiny.GetHerHisCap] tiny body is still, bloated with poison. Who would do this to such a small child?

To keep an eye on me, the servant placed me on a table in the busy cookery. At the end of my table I see [spymaster_target.GetJobTitle] [spymaster_target.GetFirstName] mixing two vials together. As [spymaster_target.GetSheHe] turns [spymaster_target.GetHerHis] back to me, I crawl forward and grab the vial. It smells sweet! I down it all in one go. [spymaster_target.GetFirstName] turns back with a terrified expression on [spymaster_target.GetHerHis] face.

A terrified servant brings little [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] to me, tears running down her cheeks. She claims that [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] drank an entire vial of poison while in the cookery! Strangely enough, [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] does not look like [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] is ailing at all... In fact [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] is babbling as usual, smiling at me.
Calm yourself, can you not see that [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] is fine?
That is... nice. Now take this obnoxious babe away, please.

I have been sent along with [child_of_destiny.Religion.GetPriestTitle] [priest_target.GetFirstName] to [temple_target.GetName] in order to learn more about the [child_of_destiny.Religion.GetName] faith. [priest_target.GetFirstName] tells me to pray in front of the candle-lit altar, eyes closed. Suddenly, a vision of [child_of_destiny.Religion.GetHighGodName] appears in front of my eyes! I was told such wondrous things, before [priest_target.GetFirstName] interrupted me – I had apparently been shouting passages from [child_of_destiny.Religion.GetScriptureName]!
I was told that I, too, would become a god one day!
I was told the truth, and I will fight for [child_of_destiny.Religion.GetHighGodName]!

I had [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] accompany [child_of_destiny.Religion.GetPriestTitle] [priest_target.GetFirstName] to the temple of [temple_target.GetName], to learn more about the [child_of_destiny.Religion.GetName] faith. Upon retuning, [priest_target.GetFirstName] claims that [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] had a vision from [child_of_destiny.Religion.GetHighGodName] while praying! Apparently my [child_of_destiny.GetDaughterSon] loudly proclaimed passages from [child_of_destiny.Religion.GetScriptureName], which [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] had no way of knowing...
Why do you bother me with this? Send [child_of_destiny.GetHerHim] back to [temple_target.GetName] for all I care!

It all went very fast. [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName], famous as [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] is, has had no trouble amassing a vast host of eager warriors. With [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] eyes set upon the realm of [target_character.GetFullName] they now embark on their adventure, without so much as a farewell. There truly were no way controlling the ambition of that [child_of_destiny.GetBoyGirl]...
I hope my [child_of_destiny.GetDaughterSon] does not forget about me...

The time has finally come! I have left the shackles of childhood behind me, ready to seize my destiny. As a [child_of_destiny.GetManWoman] I am free to forge my own path, and the path I intend to forge is paved with my unbridled ambition. Beware, world, for I am here to tame you.

After having survived a childhood more perilous than those of most old stories, [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] has grown into a magnificent young [child_of_destiny.GetManWoman]. Having shown nothing but promise throughout [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] entire upbringing, [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] has eclipsed all of [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] teachers and become a masterful strategist.
My dear [child_of_destiny.GetDaughterSon], is it not time to rest for a while now?
I dare not think what [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] is getting up to...

As I am out wandering I come across a warrior named [great_warrior_target.GetFirstName] who is decimating a hapless training dummy with impressive ease. Intrigued, I ask [great_warrior_target.GetHerHim] to teach me. At first [great_warrior_target.GetSheHe] just laughs, but eventually [great_warrior_target.GetSheHe] relents. Many hours pass, we practice swordsmanship and study the Art of War. I have never had this much fun!
When I grow up, no one will ever best me in combat!
My stratagems shall leave all enemies dumbfounded!

Just as I start to wonder where [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] is, a servant comes bearing news. Apparently [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] has spent all day practicing swordsmanship with a warrior named [great_warrior_target.GetFirstNameWithNick]! According to the servant, [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] shows great promise as a fighter and strategist – [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] evidently left [great_warrior_target.GetFirstName] very impressed!
Great news! This child will go far.
Hm, better not promote these tendencies...
Reports state that new recruits have been partaking in our initiation ritual, allowing [Root.Society.GetName] to be growing in numbers!

My [recruiting_parent.GetRootRelation] is making some less than subtle remarks over dinner tonight, commenting on my swordsmanship and asking how interested I am in strategy of war. "Honestly, [Root.GetFirstName]... When are you going to become a member of [recruiting_parent.Society.GetName]?"
I have just been waiting for you to ask.
[recruiting_parent.GetFatherMotherCap], I will carve my own path.

My [new_recruit.GetAgeAdjective] [new_recruit.GetSonDaughter] smiles broadly at my encouragement. "I thought you would never ask! I'll contact [hero_character.GetTitledFirstName] right away, [Root.GetFatherMother]."
My [new_recruit.GetAgeAdjective] [new_recruit.GetSonDaughter] smiles broadly at my encouragement. "I thought you would never ask! So... how do we do this, [Root.GetFatherMother]?"

My [new_recruit.GetAgeAdjective] [new_recruit.GetSonDaughter] rolls [new_recruit.GetHerHis] eyes at my attempted encouragement. "I will carve my own path, [Root.GetFatherMother]. Please, let me." When I do not respond, [new_recruit.GetSheHe] continues: "[hero_character.GetSocietyRank] [hero_character.GetTitledFirstName] is a bore, [Root.GetFatherMother]."

My [new_recruit.GetAgeAdjective] [new_recruit.GetSonDaughter] rolls [new_recruit.GetHerHis] eyes at my attempted encouragement. "I will carve my own path, [Root.GetFatherMother]. Please, let me." When I do not respond, [new_recruit.GetSheHe] continues: "War and combat is dreadfully boring, [Root.GetFatherMother]."
I was just waiting for you to be ready!
We'll play this fair. You're a recruit, like anybody else!

My [new_recruit.GetAgeAdjective] [new_recruit.GetSonDaughter] has joined me for dinner tonight, and not stopped talking about [new_recruit.GetHerHis] initiation duel. "It was exhilarating, [Root.GetFatherMother]! And now I am one of [new_recruit.Society.GetName]!".
I knew you had it in you, [new_recruit.GetFirstName].
You almost make me wish I hadn't left...
Are you trying to impress me or something?

My [new_recruit.GetSonDaughter] has joined me for dinner tonight, but not said a single word for what feels like an eternity. When I try to coax some conversation out of the [new_recruit.GetBoyGirl], [new_recruit.GetSheHe] mumbles: "I am not like you, [Root.GetFatherMother]", face red with shame. "I failed my initiation rite."

My [new_recruit.GetSonDaughter] has joined me for dinner tonight, but not said a single word for what feels like an eternity. When I try to coax some conversation out of the [new_recruit.GetBoyGirl], [new_recruit.GetSheHe] mumbles: "Don't be mad. I changed my mind about joining [Root.Society.GetName]."
Oh, dear... I am still proud to call you family, [new_recruit.GetFirstName].

My [From.GetFatherMother] tells me that it does not matter which path I walk. "Whether you choose the way of the sword, or the way of the quill, you are my [Root.GetSonDaughter]." We spent the rest of the evening talking about other hopes and dreams of mine, and I can only smile fondly when I think of [From.GetHerHis] support.
Family is what is most important, after all.
My [From.GetFatherMother] tells me that [From.GetSheHe] expected more from my duel, before eating the remainder of [From.GetHerHis] dinner in silence.\nI feel awful.
This is not the end of my story! Nay, [From.GetSheHe] doesn't KNOW me...!

A bird cries out and I wake up. I hear men roaring in the distance. Why am I on the ground, staring at the sky? I... I cannot move.\nIs this how [Root.GetBestName] leaves this world?\n"Go with [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]", comes the ragged voice of a wounded soldier next to me.

I am surrounded. Blood is streaking down my face and my [GetDuelWeapon] has begun to feel heavy. A huge [GetRegionalFerociousAnimal] of a man is looming towards me, but seems to decide that I am not worth the trouble. I have just enough time to wonder why before someone runs a sword through my chest.
Perhaps I should have made peace with [random_rival_target.GetFirstName]...?

During the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName] I manage to corner and cut down [home_commander.GetTitledName], hopefully teaching [home_commander.GetHerHis] troops a valuable lesson.\nIn the aftermath, my scouts find a weapon.
Let [enemy_liege.GetTitledFirstName] decide what to do with this.
I could never steal from the dead! This belongs to [home_commander.GetHerHis] family.

A weapon has been found by my soldiers. "It was dropped by [home_commander.GetTitledFirstName], my [Root.GetLordLady], at the recent battle of [battlefield_location.GetName]" my commander [enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName] says, presenting the item.

A weapon has been found by my troops. "We are told that it belonged to [home_commander.GetTitledFirstName], my [Root.GetLordLady]" an officer says, presenting the item. "It must have been lost during the recent battle of [battlefield_location.GetName]", [Root.GetSheHe] concludes.

The [battlefield_location.GetLocalWeatherAdjective] weather is getting to me. Turning to the sky, I take a deep breath. The [enemy_liege.GetEnemySoldierDesc] soldiers of [enemy_liege.GetTitledFirstName] have been sending their best at me and my limbs are becoming heavier with each step I take.

While my soldiers are fighting valiantly alongside me, one [enemy_liege.GetEnemySoldierDesc] buffoon wearing the colors of [enemy_liege.GetTitledFirstName] seems to have figured out that I am the one holding the troops together. Through the haze of my tired mind, I sense [Root.GetHerHis] lumbering advance, and [Root.GetHerHis] intent to do something about it...

My troops are performing with excellence, and my chest is swelling with pride as we keep pressing forward. I turn back to answer the call of a soldier near by, when suddenly there is a sharp pain in my [Root.GetBodyPartInjured]. Gritting my teeth, I hear an enemy shouting: "Stay down, you [GetRootFromInsult]!"
I accept any injury, if it protects [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!
I think I will rest behind this [battlefield_location.GetTreeRockFence] for a moment...
They will have to catch me first!
You don't have to ask me twice! I will stay down.

The landscape surrounding [battlefield_location.GetName] is a sight to behold. I wish I was not here for a battle. Once all of this is over, maybe I will come out here with [my_beloved.GetFirstName]..?\nMy [GetDuelWeapon] is suddenly kicked out of my hand, and a scruffy-looking soldier shouts, voice like a demon: "I'll get your [GetBodyPartInjured]!"

"You [GetRootFromInsult]!" the [enemy_liege.Culture.GetName] soldier yells as he charges at me, his expression more that of a wild animal than man. For a moment time stands still, as I am watching the movement of a shiny sword coming straight for my [GetBodyPartInjured].

I try to breathe deeply, but catching my breath in the [battlefield_location.GetLocalTemperature] weather is difficult. "Look, it's the [Root.GetTitle] [Root.GetHerselfHimself]!" someone shouts. I turn, only to find myself overrun by a dozen of [enemy_liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s [enemy_liege.GetEnemySoldierDesc] soldiers.
You won't get the best of me – I need that [Root.GetBodyPartInjured]!
Wait! How about you just take this [equipped_artifact.GetName] and let me live?!
You throw your weapon to the ground. Then you run.\n

One moment I am shouting orders, surrounded by the clanging of swords and fighting around me. The next, everything goes dark, as the world slips away from me. Are those... people, concerned faces? Everything hurts. I just want to... rest.

One moment I am shouting orders, surrounded by the clanging of swords and fighting around me. Then my memory fades, and I find myself on the ground, lying in a mixture of blood and [battlefield_location.GetGroundDesc], my ears ringing with pain. Maybe I will be a baker!" I chuckle, considering my own more strategic aspirations. "What about you, my [Root.GetLordLady]? What will you focus on in the future?"
I want to be more direct, I think. Yes, definitely.
I want to carry out the will of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].

"[Root.GetFirstName]! You [Root.GetEnemySoldierDesc] brute!" a shout carries [battlefield_location.GetThroughOver] the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain], where I am fighting a close battle alongside my personal guards. The days have been long, but nice and temperate. By my own estimates, I should be halfway to [pilgrimage_destination.GetName] by now. I am not used to long hikes like these, but it has been a nice change of pace.
The days have been long, but nice and temperate. By my own estimates, I should be halfway to Antioch. I am not used to long hikes like these, but it has been a nice change of pace.
I wonder what awaits me in Antioch.

There have been new sights to behold every day, as I travel to [pilgrimage_destination.Realm.GetName]. By my own estimates, I should be halfway to [pilgrimage_destination.GetName] by now. I am not used to long hikes like these, but it has been a nice change of pace.

There have been new sights to behold every day, as I travel to Africa. By my own estimates, I should be halfway to Hippo. I am not used to long hikes like these, but it has been a nice change of pace.
I wonder what awaits me in Hippo.

It has been a tiresome yet fulfilling journey so far, as I travel to [pilgrimage_destination.Realm.GetName]. By my own estimates, I should be halfway to [pilgrimage_destination.GetName] by now. I am not used to long hikes like these, but it has been a nice change of pace.

I come across a group of caravans, filled with the laughter and joy of a group of traveling entertainers. As day turns to night, I enjoy the company of the group. A particularly beautiful [Root.GetManWomanOpp] is teasing me, and invites me to stay the night.

I come across a group of caravans, filled with the laughter and joy of a group of traveling entertainers. As day turns to night, I enjoy the company of the group. A particularly beautiful [Root.GetManWoman] is teasing me, and invites me to stay the night.
That sounds like a nice suggestion.
What kind of [Root.GetManWoman] do you think I am?

It has been a long day of traveling, when I come across a burning inn. I had hoped to find a place to stay the night, but these people are clearly in dire need of help just stopping the flames from engulfing the entire place.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] calls upon me to help out these poor people.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] calls upon me to continue my pilgrimage.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] calls upon me to grab some valuables while they are busy.
A loud roar, and suddenly there is a huge furry creature just down the road. A bear? Now? Here? This must be a creature sent by [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] to test me and my faith.

I feel like I have been walking in circles for the last hours, and I am sure I have seen these trees before. If I continue walking in circles, I will never get out of here. A plan would be nice, but what kind of options do I have?
I will cut my path out of here, one tree at a time if I have to!
I just need to be patient, and slowly find my way out of here.
Oh, it is that way, clearly.

The rain is pouring down and I am desperately looking for a shelter, when I come across an old church. A priest welcomes me inside, gives me some warm clothes and a hot meal. When he mentions that it probably will not stop raining for a couple of days, I wonder if I have time to wait for that long.
It is better to rest a couple of days.
A real pilgrim would not let weather stop them.
I wake up with a sudden, to the hissing of a snake right next to me. This creature of the [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap] must have been sent to test my faith.
I will vanquish this evil foe!
I will just get away from this cursed place.
Maybe I should hold onto this little one, just in case?

According to all maps I have seen, there should just be wilderness here. And yet here I am standing in the middle of an empty town square. I occasionally see people through the windows, looking skeptically at me. I walk down to the town chapel, hoping to find a sensible soul there.

I open the door, and there is a huge bloody altar and dark clad people filling the room. They all turn towards me, pulling out their daggers and knives as the high priest suddenly starts talking. He bids me welcome, as I am the one who apparently will bring forth an old one.
What is this talk of old ones?
Blasphemers, I will cut you down!

The dark priest explains the ritual, which includes all of us being burnt down with the unholy church. After the church has burnt down, we will all be reborn with the old one and destroy the world as it exists right now, and reshape it in our image.
I will go along with the ritual.
This is crazy! I would rather fight my way out of here than go along with this!

I wake up, all alone in the middle of a field. I do not know what have happened with the villagers and the cultists, nor where they have gone. The last thing I remember, was the church burning down with us inside it.
I.. guess I will continue my pilgrimage?

All of a sudden, I find myself in [pilgrimage_destination.GetName] before I know it. It has been a long journey through the wilds, to once more see people is a nice change. As I walk through the city streets, I compare it to my homeland, and how the people have dealt with the cold and ice in these lands. I should find my way to the burial site of [pilgrimage_destination.province_saint.GetName] as quickly as possible, that is what I am here for after all.

All of a sudden, I find myself in Rath Celtair before I know it. It has been a long journey through the wilds, to once more see people is a nice change. As I walk through the city streets, I compare it to my homeland, how the people have dealt with the cold and ice in these lands. I should find my way to the burial site of Saint Patrick as quickly as possible, that is what I am here for after all.
I wonder what the grave will look like.

The whole area is filled with people, looking like they come from all the different corners of the world. I see another [Root.Culture.GetName] looking at me, and giving me a small nod before [Root.GetSheHeOpp] disappears in the crowd. I never knew  [pilgrimage_destination.province_saint.GetFirstNameWithNick] was this popular or well known. Though it is stressful, I finally get my moment to stand in front of the grave, and feel the blessed aura of the Saint.

There is a couple of other pilgrims around, but they all look relatively local to the area. I walk over to the grave, and look down at the small statue of the saint as well as the stone commemorating the life of the saint. It has been a long journey to get to [pilgrimage_destination.GetName], and I finally get to look upon the blessed burial site of  [pilgrimage_destination.province_saint.GetFirstNameWithNick].

The burial site is completely void of people, not a single soul to be seen. I look around for it, almost sure I am at the wrong place for a moment, and then I see the small grave. It looks overgrown and deserted, and I take some time to tidy the place up before I finally sit down in prayer to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. It is almost like  [pilgrimage_destination.province_saint.GetFirstNameWithNick] is here and prays with me.

The whole area is empty besides a nun cleaning a corner of the small chapel. She approaches me, and asks if I am here to see the grave of Saint Patrick. I give here a small nod, before she brings me to the large rock where he presumably lie. She kneels down next to me, and we take a moment to pray to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] together. And then I am left alone with the grave.
I will remember this moment for the rest of my life.
Was.. Was this it? What a disappointing end.
What a journey it has been.

All of a sudden, I find myself in [pilgrimage_destination.GetName] before I know it. It has been a long journey through the wilds, to once more see people is a nice change. As I walk through the city streets, I compare it to my homeland, and consider all the differences between the two. I should find my way to the burial site of [pilgrimage_destination.province_saint.GetName] as quickly as possible, that is what I am here for after all.

All of a sudden, I find myself in Antioch before I know it. It has been a long journey through the wilds, to once more see people is a nice change. As I walk through the city streets, I compare it to my homeland, and consider all the differences between the two. I should find my way to the burial site of Saint Christopher as quickly as possible, that is what I am here for after all.

The burial site of Saint Christopher is a large one in the middle of a square in Antioch, and few of the local populace seem to care much. I can see a couple of other pilgrims like myself, standing around the grave, looking somewhat flustered, yet happy. I can relate to them, as my journey finally reached its conclusion here in Syria. I take a long time to pray before the grave site.

All of a sudden, I find myself in [pilgrimage_destination.GetName] before I know it. It has been a long journey through the wilds, to once more see people is a nice change. As I walk through the city streets, I compare it to my homeland, and wonder how people have adjusted to these exotic lands. I should find my way to the burial site of [pilgrimage_destination.province_saint.GetName] as quickly as possible, that is what I am here for after all.

All of a sudden, I find myself in Hippo before I know it. It has been a long journey through the wilds and to once more see people is nice. As I walk through the city streets, I compare it to my homeland, and wonder how people have adjusted to these exotic lands. I should find my way to the burial site of Saint Augustine as quickly as possible, that is what I am here for after all.

It takes me a good while until I finally manage to find the chapel I was looking for. As I enter, I can truly feel the presence of Saint Augustine lingering in the place. I spend several minutes praying, until finally a priest appears. I am taken back, when he explains to me that Saint Augustine was in fact moved away from the chapel several centuries ago. That explains the lack of other pilgrims.
It has been a long journey, but I finally start recognizing my homeland once more. The woods, the streets and the people are all familiar, and I start smiling to myself. It is nice to be home.
Just one more street, and I am there!
A donation to help them out will be made.
I will do them one better, and join the monastic order myself.
All right, I wish them luck.

Years have passed with great fortunes and trading across the Baltic Sea, and the great [Root.Culture.GetName] cities in Holstein and Mecklenburg have grown into wealth and expanded considerably.

[Root.Liege.GetBestName] have given us the right of becoming Free Imperial Cities of the Empire. With my seat at [Root.Capital.GetName], I have become the new Mayor of the Hanseatic League, a large Merchant Republic that will span the entire Northern Seas.

With [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] at our back, we will grow to become a major player in the Empire. The petty feudal princes of old will bow down before us.
We have a bright future ahead of us.
That is bound to ruffle some feathers...

For a long time, the cities around the central Alps have been threatened by other actors inside the Empire. All our cities have the honor of imperial immediacy, and we have agreed to come together to defend one another. No longer will we stand alone in the face of these threats, but rather we will stand together as a stronger faction.\n\nI have been chosen as the head of this confederation, as the one who will be the figurehead of all the Cantons of our new Swiss Confederation. No longer will we be threatened by outsiders, but rather be a strong independent actor in the Empire.
We will be safer as a unified group.

A new entity known as the Swiss Confederation has risen in the Empire. They are a conglomeration of cities with imperial immediacy settled around the central Alps, and they have entered a defensive alliance to protect themselves from the other electors around them.

An independent force to be reckoned with, they have broken free from any prior claims to their lands, be it from the old Burgundians to the west or the German lords to the north

I should look out for this new potential threat in the Empire.

There has been a large increase of pilgrims traveling to see the burial site of the local Saint [local_burial_tomb.province_saint.GetFirstNameWithNick] in [local_burial_tomb.GetName]. With so many people, this is a prime opportunity for...
Refurbishing the tomb so everyone can see what a pious [Root.GetManWoman] I am.
Refurbishing the tomb and granting the church a large public donation.
Restore the tomb of Saint [local_burial_tomb.province_saint.GetFirstNameWithNick] to its former glory.

Making some money off of them.

Talk to them about my own pilgrimage.

The local Saint [saintly_burial_site.province_saint.GetFirstName] was an inspiration in many ways, and I wish I could live up to [saintly_burial_site.province_saint.GetHerHim]. I will live up to [saintly_burial_site.province_saint.GetHerHis] ideals!

[target_burial_site.GetName] is a well known traveling spot for pilgrims to see the tomb of Saint [target_burial_site.province_saint.GetFirstName]. I have never cared much for Saint [target_burial_site.province_saint.GetFirstName] nor [offended_burial_site_owner.GetTitledFirstName], and an opportunity to grab the valuables of the tomb has offered itself. But is it worth the risk?
No, I rather not do that.
Why yes, that sounds like a good idea.

"My [Root.GetLordLady], we do not have a lot of time. Should we be careful and take it slow, or hurry and grab as much as possible?" My captain asks me, as we breach the tomb of Saint [target_burial_site.province_saint.GetFirstName].
Let us be careful, and grab what we can.
You find a couple of trinkets.
Silly man, we are here to get as much as possible.

My men suddenly bring drag [From.GetTitledFirstName] into my room. "My [Root.GetLordLady], we found this [From.GetManWoman] in the tomb of Saint [target_burial_site.province_saint.GetFirstName], clearly trying to pillage the place."
Oh my, how preposterous! Put [From.GetHerHim] away!
The burial site of §YSaint [target_burial_site.province_saint.GetFirstName]§! at [target_burial_site.GetName] has been plundered, and has been left a complete mess...

My men has come across the burial site of some sort of holy person for the pathetic [pillaged_christian.Religion.GetGroupName] [pillaged_christian.GetTitledFirstName]. This could be a chance to show them how we treat their weak holy people.
Take everything of value, and leave nothing behind.
We are not barbarians like them, we will leave it alone.

I have often noticed how [sway_target.GetFirstName] seem to make awkward weird mistakes in diplomatic encounters. I have a couple of books on the matter, and [sway_target.GetSheHe] would probably be happy with my help.

[sway_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s men have outdated drilling routines, and it is almost embarrassing to see them in action. I could send him some books, or maybe some commanders, to help [sway_target.GetHerHim] get [sway_target.GetHerHis] men up to date.

I just heard about an absolutely atrocious business deal made at the behest of [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName]. I could spend some time to help [sway_target.GetHerHim] out, or send some scribes over?

All kinds of rumors have been spreading about [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName] recently. Does [sway_target.GetSheHe] have no understanding of how to cultivate a proper image? Someone need to help [sway_target.GetHerHim] out.
I came across an assertion written by [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName], and though it is well written, I have ideas for how it could be improved.
I will happily share the things I know.
A commander will get those soldiers up scratch in no time.
Let us make sure that does not happen again.
A proper image is the first step to quell court intricacies.
I will send a letter to explain how [sway_target.GetSheHe] could improve!
Maybe I am overstepping my boundaries here?
A chance to help improve [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s understanding of diplomacy, and §YSway§! [sway_target.GetHerHim] to my cause.
A chance to help improve [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s understanding of warfare, and §YSway§! [sway_target.GetHerHim] to my cause.
A chance to help improve [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s understanding of governing a realm, and §YSway§! [sway_target.GetHerHim] to my cause.
A chance to help improve [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s understanding of court intrigue, and §YSway§! [sway_target.GetHerHim] to my cause.
A chance to help improve [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s writing, and §YSway§! [sway_target.GetHerHim] to my cause.
I will refrain from offering my help.

I received a letter and a package from [From.GetTitledFirstName], where [From.GetSheHe] recommends me to take a look through the books [From.GetSheHe] sent me. They seem to be mostly focused around politics and negotiations.
A large burly man has been sent by [From.GetTitledFirstName] to help train my soldiers. For some reason they think they are better at exercising my men than I am.
A couple of scribes has been sent by [From.GetTitledFirstName]. They say they would like to help me govern my realm and aid with business deals.
A short and concise letter has been sent by [From.GetTitledFirstName], where [From.GetSheHe] discusses the recent rumors which have been spread about me.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent me a long letter about how I could improve my writing, and get a better understanding of more difficult scientific subjects.
If [From.GetSheHe] thinks [From.GetSheHe] can help, I am willing to give it a try.
I have noted a difference in the day to day political life recently, as I have started to find it a lot easier to simply converse with my courtiers and political allies.
My men look sharper and more ready for war than ever, and I feel ready to lead them to war. I would not have expected anything akin to this, just a couple of weeks ago.
Money has been flowing the last month as every business deal I do seem to go in my favor, and my people seem happier than ever.
Whatever rumors might have been floating around, seem to have dissipated the last month, and my own rumormongers have effectively spread a better image of me.
I found myself reading some of the more obscure, older books from the library. I have always been somewhat skeptical of these books, but they are not actually that bad after all.
My hard work is paying off.
I certainly worked hard for my recent accomplishments, but a lot of people have been saying it is because of [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] and [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] help.
[FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] certainly helped, and I will send a letter with my gratitude.
I would have managed to do it without [FromFromFrom.GetHerHim].
[sway_target.GetTitledFirstName] has sent me a letter with [sway_target.GetHerHis] thanks for all my work recently.
I am just happy to help out.

With every passing day I feel like things are degrading politically, and the court life is getting ever harsher. [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] said [FromFrom.GetSheHe] wanted to help, but I expected things to get better, not worse.
My men look at me with scornful eyes. Whatever [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] wanted to help me with, this is clearly not having a positive effect on the men.
Money seem to disappear, and I have started worrying if the so-called help [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] sent me was a ploy to trick me.
I keep hearing more distasteful rumors spread about me by the day. If [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] wanted to help out, this is clearly not having the effect we wanted.
I start questioning my writing, and I have lost all interest in reading. I know [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] probably wanted to help, but it is having an adverse effect.
A lot of people has blamed me for the recent chaos that has been happening around the court, but was it not [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] who originally wanted to help out?
And yet I am the one who accepted [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] help, so I am to blame.
Yes, what about [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]? Everything was fine before [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] help!

There has been a lot of chaos at [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s court recently. My courtiers suddenly approached me with a letter today, where the ungrateful bastard blames me for the recent chaos.
There has not been much of a change around court since I started following [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s advices, but I still feel somewhat more confident in my actions.
My men look more or less like they always have. Though we have started following [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s suggestions, there does not to be much of a change.
Though I have a feeling business have gone somewhat better recently, it is hard to see much of a difference, though I am grateful for the help I have been given by [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName].
The worst of the rumors have disappeared, though there is still some murmuring around the court. I have a feeling things will go better from here on though.
I have tried following [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s advices when it comes to my writing, but I am just not sure I see that much of a difference to the end result.
I feel like I have learned a little bit from the change.
[sway_target.GetTitledFirstName] not only did not accept my help, but [sway_target.GetSheHe] was furious that I dared presume [sway_target.GetSheHe] needed any kind of aid in the first place.
I think inviting [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName] to an activity we can do together would help us grow closer, but I am not entirely sure what kind of activity I should suggest.
The upcoming local fencing tournament might intrigue [sway_target.GetHerHim]?
I shall invite [sway_target.GetHerHim] to a banquet!
Let us meet in private for some deep discussions.
The festival in [Root.Capital.GetName] might catch [sway_target.GetHerHis] fancy?
My prisoners need some anatomical restructuring.
Maybe it is not such a good idea after all.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent me an invitation to join [From.GetHerHim] on a hunt. This could be an opportunity to get to know [From.GetHerHim] better.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent me an invitation to join [From.GetHerHim] in a dueling tournament, where [From.GetSheHe] need a partner. This could be an opportunity to get to know [From.GetHerHim] better.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent me an invitation to join [From.GetHerHim] for a board game evening. This could be a good opportunity to get to know [From.GetHerHim] better.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent me an invitation for an upcoming banquet. This is probably a good opportunity to get to know each other better.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent me an invitation to an upcoming discussion. I might learn something about both the discussed subject and get to know [From.GetFirstName].
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent me an invitation to a local festival at [From.Capital.GetName]. It would be a good opportunity to get to know [From.GetHerHim] better.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent me an invitation to what I assume is torture of [From.GetHerHis] prisoners. This could be a chance to get to know each other.
Sounds like it could be fun.
I have more important business to take care of.
[sway_target.GetTitledFirstName] thanked me for the invitation to join a hunt, but [sway_target.GetSheHe] does not have the time to join at the moment.
[sway_target.GetTitledFirstName] thanked me for the invitation to join the tournament, but [sway_target.GetSheHe] does not have the time to spare at the moment.
[sway_target.GetTitledFirstName] thanked me for the invitation to the board game evening, but [sway_target.GetSheHe] does not have the time to spare at the moment.
[sway_target.GetTitledFirstName] thanked me for the invitation to the banquet, but [sway_target.GetSheHe] does not have the time for something frivolous like that at the moment.
[sway_target.GetTitledFirstName] thanked me for the invitation to the discussion, but [sway_target.GetSheHe] does not have the time to join.
[sway_target.GetTitledFirstName] thanked me for the invitation to the local festival, but sadly [sway_target.GetSheHe] cannot find them to join.
[sway_target.GetTitledFirstName] thanked me for the invitation, but was not interested in joining right now.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] gives me a smile, as we start walking into the local forests around [Root.Capital.GetName]. I have been waiting for this for a while.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] looks excited as the first rounds of the tournament starts. I brandish my blade, and am ready as well.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] inquires about the nature of the game we will play, as the other attendees readies the board. A game about warfare is fitting for rulers like us, no?
I receive [From.GetTitledFirstName] at the door, and help [From.GetHerHim] inside. [From.GetSheHeCap] look around the large room, and give me an approving nod of the size of the banquet.
[From.GetFirstName] is the last one to arrive to the discussion. The conversation flows freely between everyone, jumping from topic to topic.

All kinds of sights can be seen as we walk through the streets of [Root.Capital.GetName]. Masked jugglers and people having fun all around us. I decide to show [From.GetHerHim] the local hedge-maze, to top it off.

I happily guide [From.GetFirstName] down the stairs to the dungeon, as soon as [From.GetSheHe] gets to [Root.Capital.GetName]. We have a lot of fine specimen here in [Root.Capital.GetName], and this is a prime opportunity to test them out.
We will take the win, for sure.
Let us try and learn as much as possible.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] expertly guides us through the forests. It is clear [From.GetSheHe] knows this area well. [From.GetFirstName] tells me we are looking for a wild boar that has been sighted in the area.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] expertly fences us through the first rounds of the tournament, it is clear [From.GetSheHe] has a lot of prior experience with fencing.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] helps me ready for the event, and explains the game to me. Though there is some details still unclear to me, [From.GetFirstName] promises to help me out.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] receives me at the door, and invites me inside. The banquet is larger than I originally expected, with nice looking lords and ladies all across the room.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] receives me at the door, and helps me get seated in the tiny room. The discussion quickly switches between different and difficult topics, and I am just trying to keep up.

All kinds of sites can be seen at [From.Capital.GetName]. [From.GetFirstName] shows me around the city happily, and we have a lot of fun as we come across all kinds of entertainers and events. In the end [From.GetSheHe] brings me to a local hedge-maze.

As soon as I get to [Root.Capital.GetName], [From.GetFirstName] receives me at the door, and brings me down to the dungeon. We walk past all kinds of people, looking downtrodden and like they have been through [From.GetHerHis] torture before.
I wonder if we will find it.
I will try my best to win this.
I have to say I am impressed by [From.Capital.GetName].
Hours pass with little to no excitement, when suddenly we come across the boar we were looking for. My soldiers look at me, waiting for my orders to wait it out or to hunt it down.
We pass through all the preliminary rounds with little to no issue. In the last round we are facing two large ogre looking men, the swords tiny in their hands.

As the game develops, [From.GetFirstName] and I end up partnering up. I can already see that one of us will have to sacrifice all of their units, to be able to get a win. [From.GetFirstName] does not seem to have noticed this yet.

Several hours passes, and [From.GetFirstName] seem to enjoy [From.GetHerselfHimself]. Maybe [From.GetSheHe] would enjoy [From.GetHerselfHimself] even more if we managed to find [From.GetHerHim] some company for the night?

Some hours pass as the discussions continue. We come to an impasse about the nature of the universe, with [From.GetFirstName] and I together at one side of the discussion. [From.GetSheHeCap] looks at me, clearly waiting for me to make the first line of reasoning.

At the start we are having fun as we walk through the hedge-maze, but at some point I start losing track of where we are. I get to a cross-road, and I am not sure which path I have to take to get us out.

We start testing out the different tools we have at hand, and quickly work our way through a couple of the prisoners. They almost look spiffy after we are done with them, and I have to say, we are being quite generous as we leave them mostly intact.
The larger they are, the harder they fall.
I will position myself to take the brunt of it.
I will be assertive, and explain them why they are wrong.
Confidently take a path and hope for the best.
Let us see how far we can push one of them.
Let us wait it out, and trap it.
I will manipulate [From.GetTitledFirstName] into taking most of the losses.
Let us just enjoy the evening for what it is worth, no need to stress.
Let us hold back, and disprove their arguments instead.
Be honest and try to reason our way out together.
Let us take it slow, and see how long they can withstand.
We come across the boar we have been looking for, and [From.GetFirstName] rush in and attack the wild animal without a word. The wild animal turn around, and charge at [From.GetFirstName].
We finally reach the finale of the tournament, and our last opponents are two large men. [From.GetFirstName] rush in from the start, and stay on the offensive against both of the two men.

The game is starting to develop into a bloodbath, as the armies are clashing together. [From.GetFirstName] seem to set [From.GetHerselfHimself] in a horrible position, though it leaves an opening for me to take out a lot of our opponents' units.

I don't care about the stupid stars!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has taken a deep interest in the circumstances of [From.GetHerHis] birth and in the constellations affecting [From.GetHerHis] destiny.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] seems to be unwilling to take into consideration the circumstances of [From.GetHerHis] birth and the constellations affecting [From.GetHerHis] destiny.
So what? Astrology is nothing but superstition.
Good. [From.GetSheHeCap] should not let the stars dictate [From.GetHerHis] future.
[From.GetSheHeCap] worries too much about the stars.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] warned me that I worry too much about the stars and that I should not let the circumstances of my birth affect my judgment on present events.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] praised me for not focusing too much on astrology at the expenses of my better judgment.
I should not let the stars rule over me!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] praised me today for paying the due respect to the heavens and taking a healthy interest in astrology and the influence that the stars have on me.

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] decided to scold me today for my lack of interest in astrology. [From.GetSheHeCap] warned me that I should always pay mind to the influence that stars have over people.
I must look up to see what is inside me.

I walk amongst the ruins of one of the greatest civilizations to ever grace this world. I should take the opportunity to study in detail the history and the glorious accomplishments of those that came before us if I ever wish to emulate their feats.
I wish to know more about these strange gods they worshiped...
I want to study the great generals of old and their tactics.
I wonder how the old Empire worked...
I wish to study the speeches of the great men of ancient times.

I did my best, but my attempts to study the history of the Roman Empire were not as successful as I hoped. Most accounts I was able to access are fragmented and confusing. I don't think I was able to learn anything valuable after all these months of study.

I am fascinated by the legends of the old gods worshiped by Romans and Greeks in the past. Their capricious and passionate nature differs so much from [catholic.GetHighGodName]'s unknowable and contradictory designs... Their plots and rivalries certainly offer a better explanation for the chaotic state of our world.
What if *they* are the real gods?
They are nothing but entertaining stories.

In these past months I have immersed myself in the fragmented accounts of Caesar's military exploits against the Gauls. It has been an enlightening learning experience and I am sure that, despite the difference in equipment and sizes, I can apply some of his tactics against my own enemies.

In these past months I have immersed myself in the fragmented accounts of some of Rome's greatest statesmen. Reading the works of Emperor Justinian and of his reformation of the Roman legal code in particular has been an eye-opening experience for me.

In these past months I have immersed myself in the fragmented accounts of some of Rome's finest orators. Reading through the treaties of Cicero and other great sophists has allowed me to learn a lot about the fine art of diplomacy and politics.

What horrible crime have I committed? Whenever I close my eyes I can hear the silent cries of my son that never was. The guilt for the ruthless murder of that innocent soul plagues my mind like a disease.

The unthinkable has happened. Rumors about my terrible crime have spread across the court. And, if the stories are true, I have nobody to blame but myself. The servant whisper that every night I walk in my sleep around the castle, asking forgiveness to the child I murdered before his own birth.
I feel that there is something wrong with me. The premature end to my last pregnancy broke something within me.

For centuries the Church has had free reign to lord over Rome, the ancient capital of my Empire. The influence of the Papacy looms still over the city, as its many churches can attest. Perhaps it is time to reaffirm the authority of the Empire over the Church in incontrovertible terms...

Even now that the Christians have been driven out of the great and ancient city of Rome, the monuments to their God still persist, challenging my authority as [Root.GetTitle]. I have only one option if I wish to truly claim Rome for myself...

Centuries ago, the Galileans, in order to hide their crimes, falsely accused one of my predecessors of burning Rome to the ground. Perhaps it is time I returned them the favor and cleansed the Empire's old capital of the wretched temples scourging its Seven Hills...
I must rid the city of any lingering Christian influence.
Heathens as they are, we should not destroy their temples.
We must endeavor to be better than them.

In order to stamp out any remaining rebellious aspirations and punish past insults against the Empire, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has ordered the destruction of the Holy See itself. After having priests and prelates abandon their churches in a hurry, barely giving them enough time to recover relics and books, [From.Culture.GetName] soldiers consigned the holy buildings to the flames.\nThis abominable act is certain to permanently cripple the authority of the Catholic Church for centuries to come.

In a flagrant act of disrespect and carelessness for tradition and culture, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has ordered the destruction of the Holy See itself. After having priests and prelates abandon their churches in a hurry, barely giving them enough time to recover relics and books, [From.Culture.GetName] soldiers consigned the holy buildings to the flames.\nThis abominable act is certain to permanently cripple the authority of the Catholic Church for centuries to come.

Living up the reputation of the heathen Emperors of old, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has ordered the ruthless destruction of the Holy See itself, in an attempt to undermine Christendom. After forcefully locking priests and cardinals within their own churches, [From.Culture.GetName] soldiers consigned the holy buildings to the flames.\nThis abominable act is certain to permanently cripple the authority of the Catholic Church for centuries to come.
The wailing of Christians does not concern me.
Galileans will be the ones to burn for a change...
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is forever damned by this act!
The burning of Christian temples is of no concern to us.
It is time somebody rectified the failings of our ancestors...

The citizens of Rome have not reacted well to the city's great fire. After boiling for a few days, a large mob of peasants has broken the peace and assaulted the local garrison, rebelling openly against the destruction of the Holy See and the collateral damage caused by the fire to the people's homes.

I have restored the Empire, a feat worthy of immortal glory, yet now doubts beset my mind. How can I ensure that this Empire will not fall like it did in the past? When looking for the causes that fragmented and destroyed the old Empire, there is only one thing that appears to be constant...
Christianity led us to our fall...
Weak and impious leaders doomed us.

Could it be possible that, by embracing the barbaric Eastern religion of Christ, Emperor Theodosius weakened the Empire, and that, conversely, I might be able to strengthen it by reintroducing the worship of the old gods? My decision could just as easily doom the Empire a second time as I attempt to save it...
I must act quickly, when people still praise me for restoring the Empire!
I must act patiently and find kindred souls before revealing my plans.

[Root.GetTitledName],
We have come to the conclusion that Our predecessors' attachment to the barbaric cult of the Galileans is inextricably tied to the fall of this great Empire of ours, and I have come to the resolution that, in order to truly restore the glory of Rome, we must also restore its ancient religion.

Sincerely, 
[From.GetTitledName]
I must bow to the Imperial will.

I shall not be part of this farce. I am a §Y[From.Religion.GetName]§!, and I will not abandon my faith in [From.Religion.GetHighGodName].

Sincerely, 
[From.GetTitledName]

I am happy to stand right beside you for the resurgence of the §YHellenic§! faith, my [Root.GetTitle].

Sincerely, 
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName],
I have come to the conclusion to abide by the new Imperial decree and convert to the Hellenic faith. I expect all my subordinates to follow me in this decision.

Sincerely, 
[From.GetTitledName]
I will not convert to a dead religion!

The great celebrations across the Christian world after the restoration of the Roman Empire at the hands of [From.GetTitledFirstName] have been cut short by a terrifying and unexpected turn of events. The new [From.GetTitle] has determined that Christianity is a barbarous and seditious cult that has no place in [From.GetHerHis] new Empire. \nIn an effort to rebuild the past glory of Rome in its entirety, [From.GetSheHe] has forsaken [From.GetHerHis] faith in favor of worshiping the old pagan gods of [From.GetHerHis] ancestors.
The old gods will rise from the ashes of the Church!
We stand united against the barbarity of the Galileans!
Babylon has risen again! The end time is near!
This is of no concern to us.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has clearly gone insane, yet, with the authority [From.GetSheHe] has accumulated after [From.GetHerHis] many accomplishments, [From.GetSheHe] might be able of perverting the Empire into a force for evil, a nation of idolaters. [From.GetSheHeCap] must be stopped now, before it's too late!
We must rise up and depose this tyrant!
There is nothing we can do.

To all the faithful of the One True God!\nThe [From.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] has taken over our [scoped_hellenic_emperor.GetTitle]'s mind, twisting it with lies and madness. We must stand together and depose the Apostate who sits on the holy throne of Rome or see the accursed heathens spread once again across our world.\n[From.GetTitledName]
These are the words of a traitor.

The time has come!\nAll the followers of the One True God suffering under the yoke of our mad [scoped_hellenic_emperor.GetTitle] have reunited under my lead and are ready to bring the blasphemous tyrant to justice.

Several indignant vassals have banded together to stand against the new Imperial religion of Rome. They have taken arms and plan to overthrow their own [scoped_hellenic_emperor.GetTitle] and restore the worship of their god throughout the Empire.
I cannot say I am surprised...

Despite the incredible unpopularity of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] decision, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has managed to emerge victorious from the Empire's recent civil war and reaffirm [FromFrom.GetHerHis] desire to restore the Hellenic faith to the Roman world. After [FromFrom.GetHerHis] show of force and lucidity, the Emperor has gained several new supporters, both amongst the people as well as the nobility. \n\nThis is truly a new beginning for Rome and a dark day for Christians everywhere.

The Civil War has ended, and [FromFromFrom.GetFirstName] has reaffirmed [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] authority as our rightful [FromFromFrom.GetTitle]. Perhaps it is time I reconsidered my choice and embraced Hellenism, lest I suffer the [FromFromFrom.GetTitle]'s wrath.
Deep down I always believed in [hellenic_pagan.GetHighGodName]!
No, I must stand my ground!

As expected, the reintroduction of ancient Roman law and customs has not been well received by the Galilean moralizers. An entire coalition of Christian priests has petitioned me to put a stop to these new excesses to prevent the damnation of my subjects' souls.

The higher standards of living that many of my subjects have had access to since the restoration of the Empire have caused the ire of a few moralizers amongst my Christian subjects. A group of petitioners from the Church's clergy has pleaded me to put a stop to these new, luxurious customs, as they are detrimental to my people's salvation.

The higher standards of living that many of my subjects have had access to since the restoration of the Empire appear to have caused the anger of some Christian priests. A group of petitioners from the Church's clergy has pleaded me to put a stop to these new, luxurious customs, as they are detrimental to my people's salvation.
Your cult of mediocrity is no longer law.
I care not for the lamentations of infidels.
On the contrary, I must be charitable to be virtuous!
We will endeavor to be moderate.
It is not our intention to upset the Christians.
Far from me to eschew humility...

The newborn [leader_of_myrmidons.Religion.GetName] religion has found new protectors in the Myrmidons, a company of faithful warriors dedicated to the protection of the sacred altars of the old gods and the fight against the barbarous infidels besieging them.\n They swear loyalty to all [leader_of_myrmidons.Religion.GetName] rulers against those who would do them harm. A most devout [leader_of_myrmidons.GetManWoman], named [leader_of_myrmidons.GetFirstName], has pledged [leader_of_myrmidons.GetHerselfHimself] to undertake the leadership of the order to preserve their way of life.

The ancient [Root.Religion.GetName] is proving unable to withstand the onslaught of its organized, proselytizing neighbors. Rather than abandoning the old ways, [Root.GetTitledName] and the most powerful of [Root.GetHerHis] priests have decided to reform the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith in order to turn the tides and protect their ancient customs.\nWith official clergy and ratified scriptures, this new religion has already started to spread amongst the old [Root.Religion.GetName] faithful.
My lover [From.GetFirstName] has just informed me that she is pregnant with my child.
I have received news that my lover [From.GetFirstName] is with child. Hopefully she will be able to persuade her husband to be the real father.
Now that I have embraced the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, I must choose which branch of it I ascribe to...

Many gods inhabit the [Root.Religion.GetName] pantheon, but it would be only right to dedicate such an important temple as [scoped_temple_barony.GetName] to one of the twelve Olympians, the most prestigious of the deities watching us from above.
This temple belongs to one of the Kronid brothers.
Dedicate the temple of §Y[scoped_temple_barony.GetName]§! to one of the three sons of [GetKronosSaturnName]: §Y[GetZeusJupiterName]§!, §Y[GetPoseidonNeptuneName]§!, or §Y[GetHadesPlutoName]§!.
Let the gods of war consecrate this temple!
Dedicate the temple of §Y[scoped_temple_barony.GetName]§! to one of the more bellicose deities of the pantheon: §Y[GetAthenaMinervaName]§!, §Y[GetAresMarsName]§!, or §Y[GetHephaestusVulcanName]§!.
This is the home of a kind deity.

[GetZeusJupiterName] is by many considered the King of Heaven. He and his brothers fought a war against their father for control of all Creation and then gambled over its spoils. Fate bestowed dominion of the skies upon [GetZeusJupiterName], leaving the seas to [GetPoseidonNeptuneName] and the earth to [GetHadesPlutoName].

[GetAresMarsName] has always been a very popular god amongst the Romans, observing a more direct and passionate approach to war compared to his sister [GetAthenaMinervaName]. While not explicitly a god of war, [GetHephaestusVulcanName] is often associated with blacksmiths, siege engines and weapons.
The signs are not as bad as the diviner says...
Foolish priest! This is actually a good omen!
§YFull Cognatic Law§! and §YFull Status of Women§! are enforced throughout the realm.
Now that I have found a [Root.Religion.GetName] priest willing to crown me, I must decide how much I wish to spend on the ceremony leading up to it.
On second thought, I think I will wait for now.

My dissertation on military matters was very appreciated it seems: [From.GetTitledFirstName] thanked me for sharing my knowledge with [From.GetHerHim], remarking that [From.GetSheHe] will treasure what [From.GetSheHe] has learned from me.

[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s response to my military dissertation was cold and disinterested. Whether [From.GetSheHe] is does not care about military matters, or [From.GetSheHe] doubts the validity of my suggestions, it is clear that [From.GetSheHe] was not impressed by my words.

Since [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s gruesome execution, the most baffling rumor has been spreading throughout my realm. People around [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have come to believe that the traits I share with the old tyrant of Akragas are no mere coincidence, but rather the proof that I must be a descendant of the infamous Phalaris.\n\nIf I allow such rumors to keep spreading, my entire dynasty's reputation might be stained forever.
If the people cannot love me, they will learn to fear me.
I must stop this madness before it gets out of hand.
I was shocked to hear what fate [From.GetTitledFirstName] has in store for me. This deranged lunatic plans to lock me inside a brazen bull and cook me alive!

As I hear the delightful melody coming from my brazen bull as the screams of [From.GetTitledFirstName] are filtered through the contraption, I find myself reflecting upon how much I have come to rely on this wonderful instrument, and on how much I resemble the enlightened King of Sicily who employed it the first time...

After spending some time researching as well as discussing with a local blacksmith, I was able to submit [From.GetFirstName] to the most intriguing of tortures – a brazen bull. As the [From.GetManWoman] was cooked inside this wonderful contraption, [From.GetHerHis] screams were turned into a delightful and cautionary melody for all my court to hear...
I was shocked to hear what fate [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has in store for me. This deranged lunatic plans to lock me inside a brazen bull and cook me alive!
