[From.GetTitledFirstName] is pushed screaming and kicking inside the brazen bull in the middle of the throne room, under the silent watch of all my courtiers. The [From.GetManWoman]'s desperate shrieking as [From.GetSheHe] is roasted alive inside the contraption soon turns into harmonious bellowing.

The guards drag me out of the dungeon and to [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s court. My hopes for freedom vanish quickly as I see the imposing figure of the brass bull staring at me from the middle of the hall, surrounded by fearful courtiers. The guards drag me towards the statue while the executioner starts stoking the fires beneath it.
Let's try something more original this time...
Ugh, just throw them in the Brazen Bull...

Foul rumors are spreading from Sicily. The once prosperous Mediterranean isle has been fallen into the hands of a cruel [From.GetManWoman], who claims to be a descendant of the [pagan_group.GetName] Tyrants of old. 

Consumed by paranoid delusions and sadistic fantasies, [From.GetSheHe] has killed hundreds of [From.GetHerHis] own subjects for the most trivial of slights. 
Most of [From.GetHerHis] victims have met their end in the fiery belly of [From.GetHerHis] brazen bull, symbol of [From.GetHerHis] degenerate dynasty.

My recent victory over the Roman armies of [defeated_emperor.GetTitledFirstName] has resonated across [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Despite all odds, I was able to lead my people against all the legions and the formidable power of the Imperial fleet, laying waste upon the decadent rule of House [defeated_emperor.GetOnlyDynastyName]. \nSuch was my triumph that the people have started to compare me to Teuta, an ancient [pagan_group.GetName] Queen who once stood against the ambitions of Rome, going even as far as to whisper that my prowess in this war is proof that I share some of my blood with her.

My recent victory over the Roman armies of [defeated_emperor.GetTitledFirstName] has resonated across [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Despite all odds, I was able to stand strong against all the legions and the formidable power of the Imperial fleet, laying waste upon the decadent rule of House [defeated_emperor.GetOnlyDynastyName]. \nSuch was my triumph that the people have started to compare me to Teuta, an ancient Queen who once stood against the ambitions of Rome, going even as far as to whisper that my prowess in this war is proof that I share some of my blood with her.
And why not? We have so much in common...
Nonsense! I have nothing in common with her.

As if the humiliation for our recent defeat at the hands of [From.GetTitledFirstName] was not a price steep enough to pay for the Empire, more barbarians are gathering around the banner of our enemy, emboldened by the recent success of their brethren. Their leader has started to spread ludicrous rumors about her ancestral ties to Queen Teuta, another rebellious Queen of Illyria of bygone times. \nWe must clean the stain of this failure from our reputation before it is too late...

The [defeated_emperor.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has recently suffered an ignominious defeat at the hands of [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Galvanized by their victory, the people of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have started idolizing their [From.GetTitle], comparing [From.GetHerHim] to a ruler of their legends and claiming [From.GetHerHim] to have such a heroic ascendancy.\n Through her victory, the pagan tribes of old Illyria have discovered a new strength to stand against their Roman masters.
Enjoy your fleeting victory while you can!

Dozens of ships have gathered at the shores of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] from the most disparate owners – pirates, adventurers, mercenaries, fishermen... They have not forgotten how I protected them from the Empire in the past, and have all decided to pledge their allegiance to me by offering their help in the war effort.

Dozens of ships have gathered at the shores of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] from the most disparate owners – pirates, adventurers, mercenaries, fishermen... They have not forgotten how [pirate_bloodline_target.GetTitledFirstName] protected their forefathers from the Empire, and have all decided to pledge their allegiance to me by offering their help in the war effort.

A few dozen ships have gathered at the shores of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] from the most disparate owners – pirates, adventurers, mercenaries, fishermen... It seems my name still holds some sway with the people. They have all decided to pledge their allegiance to me by offering their help in the war effort.

A few dozen ships have gathered at the shores of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] from the most disparate owners – pirates, adventurers, mercenaries, fishermen... It seems that the name of [pirate_bloodline_target.GetTitledFirstName] still holds some sway with the people. They have all decided to pledge their allegiance to me by offering their help in the war effort.

A few pirate ships have gathered at the shores of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Their owners have offered their services in the war to come, hoping to repay me for offering them haven from the tyranny of the Imperial fleet of the Romans.

A few pirate ships have gathered at the shores of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Their owners have offered their services in the war to come, hoping to repay my family for offering them haven from the tyranny of the Imperial fleet of the Romans.

A promising member of [invited_lodge_soldier.Society.GetName], [invited_lodge_soldier.GetFirstName], is eager to test [invited_lodge_soldier.GetHerHis] mettle in battle and prove [invited_lodge_soldier.GetHerHis] loyalty fighting by my side and leading my armies against the enemies of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
Good! And I already know who to replace...
I expect great things from you, [invited_lodge_soldier.GetFirstName].

My brothers and sisters of [Root.Society.GetName] will gladly come to the help of a fellow [finnish_pagan_reformed.GetName] warrior in the time of need, rushing out of their sacred forests to prove their mettle and fight against the enemies of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
I need strong fighters to vanquish my foes!
I need staunch spear-men to defend my homeland!
I need swift riders to pursue my enemies!
Perhaps I do not need their assistance for now...

With the galvanizing presence of [Root.Society.GetName] to lead my troops, scores of new recruits are riding to [Root.Capital.GetName], abandoning their lives as shepherds to become warriors and earn immortal glory by fighting for me.

The fervor of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] runs still through the veins of the people of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. When called to action, they rush to their family weapons and ride to my banner, ready to show once more the strength and ruthlessness of their ancestors to all those who oppose us.
As the [zun_pagan.GetName] mystics surround me, preparing my body and mind for the ritual, one of them asks me what do I wish to do with the power bestowed to me by [zun_pagan.GetHighGodName].
I wish to lead my troops to victory!
I wish to vanquish my enemies!
I wish to inspire my warriors to greatness!
On second thought, maybe this was a bad idea...

My brothers and sisters of [Root.Society.GetName] have heeded my call to action. [scoped_slavic_savior.GetTitledFirstName], a valiant follower of [scoped_slavic_savior.Religion.GetRandomGodName], has assembled a host of warriors to aid me in the ongoing war.
Welcome! I am glad to meet you!

[scoped_slavic_savior.GetFirstName] has been working restlessly to aid [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] win the war since [scoped_slavic_savior.GetHerHis] arrival. I must admit I have grown really fond of [scoped_slavic_savior.GetHerHim] in the past few days...
But does [scoped_slavic_savior.GetSheHe] love me back, I wonder?
I cannot distract [scoped_slavic_savior.GetHerHim] with this nonsense right now.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has grown really fond of me since I joined [From.GetHerHis] campaign. It has come to the point where [From.GetSheHe] flat out admitted [From.GetHerHis] love for me openly.
You are not really my type.
I was happy to discover that [From.GetFirstName] shares my feeling for [From.GetHerHim]. Now that we are together, nothing will be able to stop us!
Unfortunately, [From.GetFirstName] admitted that [From.GetSheHe] does not shares my feelings for [From.GetHerHim].

[scoped_slavic_savior.GetFirstName] has been working restlessly to aid [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] win the war since [scoped_slavic_savior.GetHerHis] arrival. I could certainly use more fighters like [scoped_slavic_savior.GetHerHim] in my court...
Still, I shouldn't be too careless trusting a stranger...

I must show my devotion to the divine patrons of my Lodge if I wish for them to favor me in battle. The greater my sacrifice the greater will be the reward that the old gods will grant me in the wars to come.

Although I follow the teachings of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], giving to the old gods their due might help me in the coming wars. Their violent nature well fits my need for fierceness and savagery.
I will immolate my own flesh and blood to please you!
I will sacrifice one of my people to the old gods.
I will immolate one of the most prized specimens from my livestock.
I will immolate some of my best horses.
I will offer food and gold to satisfy your whims.

Two warriors from the Lodge carry [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetFirstName] outside, ignoring [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis] kicking and screaming. While the priests prepare me for the ritual by inscribing holy signs under my skin, the offering is brought to the tallest tree we can find and hanged from its strongest branch. We then start chanting hymns to the old gods under the twitching shadow of [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetFirstName].

We ride for a few hours in the wilderness, leaving all signs of civilization behind us. Once we are alone, a pair of fellow warriors tie [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetFirstName] on the ground and I repeatedly trample [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim] with my horse while the priests beat their drums and chant around us. Once the offering has been made, the warriors paint my face and invoke the spirits' powers to protect me.

After leading [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetFirstName] in the woods, a few warriors and I start stalking [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim], our faces painted and our bodies covered in pelts. We run after our prey, howling the gods' names and throwing rocks at [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim]. In the end, after having surrounded [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim], we tear [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim] apart, offering [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis] flesh to the gods.

Under the maddening beating of the shamans' drums, the warriors bring [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetFirstName] forward. I approach [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim], my face inscribed with the sacred symbols, and carve a long cut through [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis] throat, grabbing [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim] by the head and showering the Lodge's totem with [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis] blood.

[scoped_war_sacrifice.GetFirstName] is driven by my fellow warriors to the top of the temple while the priests chant praises to the Sun and cover my face in golden dust. When the victim is brought to my feet, I plunge my blade through [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis] chest and carve out [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis] heart, offering it to the eternal aster

We meet in a secluded grove, a few warriors carrying my offering to the gods and a priest bringing all the sacred tools to officiate the rite. [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetFirstName] is stripped naked and cleaned. The warriors then bring [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim] whimpering to my feet, and I plunge my blade through [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis] neck, pushing it all the way to [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis] beating heart.

Two warriors from the Lodge carry [sacrificed_courtier.GetFirstName] outside, ignoring [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHis] kicking and screaming. While the priests prepare me for the ritual by inscribing holy signs under my skin, the offering is brought to the tallest tree we can find and hanged from its strongest branch. We then start chanting hymns to the old gods under the twitching shadow of [sacrificed_courtier.GetFirstName].

We ride for a few hours in the wilderness, leaving all signs of civilization behind us. Once we are alone, a pair of fellow warriors tie [sacrificed_courtier.GetFirstName] on the ground and I repeatedly trample [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHim] with my horse while the priests beat their drums and chant around us. Once the offering has been made, the warriors paint my face and invoke the spirits' powers to protect me.

After leading [sacrificed_courtier.GetFirstName] in the woods, a few warriors and I start stalking [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHim], our faces painted and our bodies covered in pelts. We run after our prey, howling the gods' names and throwing rocks at [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHim]. In the end, after having surrounded [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHim], we tear [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHim] apart, offering [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHis] flesh to the gods.

Under the maddening beating of the shamans' drums, the warriors bring [sacrificed_courtier.GetFirstName] forward. I approach [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHim], my face inscribed with the sacred symbols, and carve a long cut through [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHis] throat, grabbing [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHim] by the head and showering the Lodge's totem with [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHis] blood.

[sacrificed_courtier.GetFirstName] is driven by my fellow warriors to the top of the temple while the priests chant praises to the Sun and cover my face in golden dust. When the victim is brought to my feet, I plunge my blade through [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHis] chest and carve out [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHis] heart, offering it to the eternal aster.

We meet in a secluded grove, a few warriors carrying my offering to the gods and a priest bringing all the sacred tools to officiate the rite. [sacrificed_courtier.GetFirstName] is stripped naked and cleaned. The warriors then bring [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHim] whimpering to my feet, and I plunge my blade through [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHis] neck, pushing it all the way to [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHis] beating heart.

A couple of fellow warriors help me constrain the majestic offering that I have personally picked from my livestock for this occasion. While a a priest chants, I plunge the sacrificial dagger deep into the beast's flesh, letting its blood shower over my face. I turn around and the priests inscribe a few holy symbols on my face with blood and dirt.
May this sacrifice bring me fortune!

My fellow warriors accompany me into the wilderness, helping me to carry my generous offering to the gods. When we are far from civilization, we bury the gold and burn the food. While a priest chants, invoking the protectors of the Lodge to bestow me their power, one of my fellow warriors inscribes a few symbols on my face.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has organized several outstanding athletes and gladiators under [From.GetHerHis] employ to form the brotherhood of the Olympian Champions, a society dedicated to the pursuit of excellence through physical labor.\nAlthough this society is based for the most part on Hellenic principles, its doors are open to any barbarian that shows [From.GetHerHis] willingness to learn discipline and follow the teachings of the school's masters.

With the help of [Root.Society.GetName], this battle is ours to lose! Already my fellow fighters are rallying from all over the realm, ready to show me their bravery in battle. In but a few months, we will drown our enemies in steel and blood!
Come, my friends! Eternal glory awaits the bravest among us!
New, eager fighters have joined me at §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! to earn their glory by my side.

Reinforcements from [Root.Society.GetName] have been dwindling since a few weeks. The promise of eternal glory does no longer yield enough attraction to the remaining members of the Lodge. Perhaps some need another kind of persuasion...
What kind of warriors are you?!
I will share my loot with any who wish to join me!
I need no cowards in my army.

Some of the more undisciplined elements within my new troops have started to complain that I do not share the loot from our battles equally. They are demanding for what they consider their rightful compensation, threatening to leave my army if their request is denied.
Begone then! I have no need of you!
The valor I have shown in battle has not inspired just seasoned warriors. Many of my subjects have traveled to [Root.Capital.GetName], hoping to prove their worth against my enemies.
I will have them trained in no time!
Your bravery moves me, but this is not your fight.
Wonderful! You will soon meet your opponents!
You can help with the supply lines.
Perhaps this was not a good idea...
The shamans from [Root.Society.GetName] quickly explain to me how, before deciding what kind of spirit I wish to trap, we must determine what sort of fetish I am trying to create...

The shamans of [Root.Society.GetName] have completed the preliminary work for my spirit-mask. Before moving onto the sacred carving, they need to know how much am I willing to invest in the creation of this artifact. A mask carved from rarer woods and imbued with sacred oils will be capable to channel more powerful spirits.
This is as much as I am willing to spend...
What is wrong with regular wood?

The shamans of [Root.Society.GetName] have completed the preliminary work for my idol. The only thing that I have left to tell them is what sort of spirit do I wish to curry the favor of and how much I am willing to invest in the rare resources needed to craft the artifact.
A priced totem to channel the cunning of a Trickster!
An ivory idol to channel the resolve of a Howler!
A wooden rod will do fine.

My new mask is nearly complete. The only thing that is left for the shamans to do is fill it with a powerful spirit that will inspire me whenever I wear it, giving me with the strength and determination I need to crush my enemies.
I wish you to summon a benevolent spirit.
I wish you to summon a malevolent spirit.

My new mask is nearly complete. The only thing that is left for the shamans to do is fill it with a spirit that will inspire me whenever I wear it, giving me with the strength and determination I need to defeat my enemies.
I wish you to summon a brave spirit.
I wish you to summon a ruthless spirit.
I wish you to summon a Trickster.
My new mask is nearly complete. The only thing that is left for the shamans to do is fill it with a spirit that will inspire me whenever I wear it, giving me a bit more strength and determination.
I wish you to summon a resentful spirit.
I wish you to summon an unwavering spirit.
I wish you to summon a fleeting spirit.

As the last symbols are painted upon the carved surface of the totem, the shamans sings their spells around it, binding the Trickster spirit inside the sacred wood, so that it might serve me and my descendants for generations to come.
This spirit will protect the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] tribe from now on.

I spend the entire night awake, tormented by the yells of the shamans chanting their spells to entrap a spirit in my new idol. At dawn, the tired old men present me with the ivory artifact, now imbued with its vengeful new guest. The shamans assure me that I will be able to turn the power inside it against my enemies and that the spirit will faithfully serve all of my descendants.

After giving me my new magic staff, the shamans take some time to explain to me how I will be able to summon winds and rain and control the very heavens by properly channeling the powers contained within this precious artifact.
Is it supposed to make all this noise?

As some of the shamans paint the final symbols on the large wooden mask, the smoke of the many offerings fills the air and the magic chants resonate through the field, the spirit is bound to the artifact, imbuing it with arcane power. The shamans offer me the mask, assuring me that I will be able to make use of its magic by wearing it in battle.
Let my foes tremble at my sight!

The shamans carve the final details on the surface of the mask, whispering ancient spells to bind the ethereal spirit to it for centuries to come. When they are satisfied with their work, they turn around and offer me the artifact, assuring me that I will be able to access to its power by wearing it in battle.
My family will treasure this gift forever.
My enemies will learn to fear the blood of [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]!

The shamans' work has finally born its fruits. My new mask is ready, filled with the essence of an ancient spirit which the shamans assure me will grant me a portion of its power to use against my enemies.
I already feel its energy coursing through my veins!

The heavens briefly lit up and the ground shook as the rock from the sky crashed into the castle gardens. I sent my men to investigate and they came back with a lump of a curious metal we have not seen before.
This metal will make for a truly legendary blade!
This was a gift from [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. It should go to the church.
It's just metal. Sell it, and do it quickly.
You set your smiths to work on forging a weapon from the metal.

It has been a few weeks since the great rock from the sky landed in my gardens, and the weapon that I ordered forged from the metal is complete. I look upon the sword with wonder – all the way from the heavens and now in my hand!
This is truly a glorious weapon.

Iceland, despite its ominous name, has proven to be quite fertile. Up until this point only a few hermits inhabited the island, though this is no longer the case. Many [settler_of_iceland_target.Culture.GetName] settlers are now flocking to its coasts, sponsored with ships and building materials by [settler_of_iceland_target.GetFullName], in search of a new life. [left_iceland_target.GetFullName] and [left_iceland_target.GetHerHis] followers have left the island in disgust, returning south to their ancestral homes.

I truly enjoy a good duel. There is nothing I desire more than to challenge and win against the greatest fighters of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], except perhaps winning glory in personal combat against my enemies... Perhaps I should dedicate my life to this pursuit?
I shall become the greatest duelist [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has ever known!
No, I have a realm to attend to.

After having studied the strategies of both my own side, as well as those of my enemies, I feel confident that I have gathered enough knowledge to truly consider myself a battlefield strategist. I feel compelled to spend my life doing this, but is it a worthy pastime for a [Root.GetTitle]?

Bored, I decide to sneak out onto the streets of [child_of_destiny.Location.County.GetName]. I suddenly hear a voice. "Ah, young [child_of_destiny.GetPrincessPrince] [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName]!" It is an old [wise_man_target.GetManWoman], overburdened with books. "I am [wise_man_target.GetFirstName]. The stars have given me a quest – to teach you about the world and the mind of man." [wise_man_target.GetSheHeCap] holds out two books. "Our time is limited, which tome should we study?"
"Virtute Animi", I want to lead and inspire!
"Dominus Omnium", my future realm shall prosper!

My servants apparently lost track of [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] today, and it took hours to locate [child_of_destiny.GetHerHim]! [child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] was found in the nick of time, just before I was about to order a full-scale search. When they found [child_of_destiny.GetHerHim] [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] was reading a book no one had ever seen before, written in latin no less...
[child_of_destiny.GetFirstName], oh how you scared me...! And how do you know Latin?
Ridiculous... dispose of that book, and keep an eye on [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName]!

I have always been very beloved, though until now I have never thought much about it. Wherever I go, others my age admire me with obvious infatuation! I am constantly showered with compliments and gifts, like I was a [child_of_destiny.GetKingQueen]! I am the center of attention wherever I go, and I like it!
Perhaps one of the [child_of_destiny.GetBoyGirlOpp]s will win my heart one day?
I do not like limiting my options...

[child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] is no mere child anymore, that much is evident. [child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] is constantly surrounded by young infatuated admirers, and [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] is obviously enjoying the attention!
[child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] sure is popular with children [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] age...
How quaint. Guards, please relocate all of these annoying admirers!

As I sit in my room, I hear a rustling sound outside the [child_of_destiny.GetChamberOpening]. Suddenly, a [attempted_murderer.GetManWoman] bursts in, brandishing a rusty [GetRandomWeapon]! [attempted_murderer.GetSheHeCap] is covered head-to-toe in blood, and screeches maniacally: "[attempted_murderer.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap] will have your soul!" I quickly grab a red-hot poker from the fireplace and the [attempted_murderer.GetManWoman], in [attempted_murderer.GetHerHis] frenzy, impales [attempted_murderer.GetHerselfHimself] on it...
I can not trust anyone after this...
This must have been divine intervention!

Grave news! This very night, [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] was assaulted in [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] [child_of_destiny.GetChamber]! An assassin somehow managed to sneak into the [Root.GetHolding], killing any guard in [attempted_murderer.GetHerHis] way. In a stroke of luck, [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] managed to impale the assailant on a fire poker. [attempted_murderer.GetSheHeCap] was later identified as [attempted_murderer.GetFullName], who the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s had long suspected of deviancy...
By [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], how could this happen? Redouble the guard!
By [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], what if they come for me next?

Wherever I go, all eyes are upon me. One [sex_partner.GetManWoman] in particular stands out – [sex_partner.GetSheHe] is stunningly [sex_partner.GetBeautifulHandsome], and looks at me with such hunger in [sex_partner.GetHerHis] eyes... Perhaps I should encourage [sex_partner.GetHerHim]?
I have more important matters to attend to...

In order to teach me how to hunt, [marshal_target.GetJobTitle] [marshal_target.GetFirstName] has brought me into the forest. We are silently moving through the shrubbery as I spot a [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalSmallGameAnimal]! I give chase, running until I manage to get a clear shot off – it is a kill! I turn around to face [marshal_target.GetFirstName] with a gleeful smile on my face, but in [marshal_target.GetHerHis] stead is a massive [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal]! I ready my spear, and then I...
... use a rock as leverage and puncture the neck of the [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal] as it attacks!
... run towards the nearby cliff and feint the [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal] so it falls off!

I am awestruck when I see what [marshal_target.GetJobTitle] [marshal_target.GetFirstName] and [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] has brought back from their hunt. A trophy from a massive [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal]! I thought they were hunting for [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalSmallGameAnimal]... [marshal_target.GetFirstName] ensures me that [marshal_target.GetSheHe] and [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] tracked the [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal] together, and that [marshal_target.GetSheHe] absolutely did not lose track of where [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] was, only arriving after the [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal] was already dead...
What? How can this be? Sounds highly suspect...

Horrible news! While out hunting with [marshal_target.GetJobTitle] [marshal_target.GetFirstName], [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] was killed by a massive [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal]! According to [marshal_target.GetJobTitle] [marshal_target.GetFirstName] the beast came out of nowhere and devoured [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] in one big gulp, before turning on [marshal_target.GetHerHim] and chasing [marshal_target.GetHerHim] out of the forest...

My blood burns with ambition, I can stay idle no longer! It is my destiny to become [child_of_destiny.GetKingQueen], and I have the support I need to realize it! Just one question remains, should I focus my ambition inwards, or outwards? Should I stay and fight for the throne of [top_liege_match_target.PrimaryTitle.GetName], or should I abandon my past and look towards [target_invasion_character.PrimaryTitle.GetName]?

The time has come. My blood burns with ambition, I can stay idle no longer! It is my destiny to become [child_of_destiny.GetKingQueen], and I have the support I need to realize it! My eyes are set upon [target_invasion_character.PrimaryTitle.GetName], and all the riches that lie within...
I shall lead my armies towards [target_invasion_character.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!
The time is not right... I will give it more time.

I always expected [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] to do this, though I hoped the day would never come... [child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] has, with popular support, laid claim to [top_liege_match_target.PrimaryTitle.GetName]! With a massive host of willing soldiers backing [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] claim, I fear it will not be long before a civil war breaks out...
Oh [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] ambition will ruin us all!

It seems as if [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] has decided that [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] ambitions will never be realized as long as [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] stays in [top_liege_match_target.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. [child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] has attracted a massive host of eager soldiers, willing to fight and die for [child_of_destiny.GetHerHim], which he is steering towards the realm of [target_invasion_character.GetFullName]. I fear [target_invasion_character.PrimaryTitle.GetName] is doomed...
This is the last drop, [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] is out of the will!
What a relief! Now [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] is [target_invasion_character.GetFirstName]s problem!

Lately my thoughts have been shaded by dark clouds. Today I read a book about an ancient hero, and [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] reminds me of myself! [child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] fights impossible odds, and overcomes hardships similar to my own. It is as if the hero of the book and myself share a destiny! I must not doubt myself, this world will be mine one day.
Beware, darkness - for I shall banish you from my mind!

My natural charisma has led me to become very popular. Other kids do not dare to pick on me, as I have many friends who would come to my aid at a moments notice. In fact, there is always someone following me around. Whatever I want them to do, they will do for me – in the playground, I rule.
When I am [child_of_destiny.GetKingQueen], loyalty will be rewarded.
They say they would die for me, I like that!

[child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] seems to be very charismatic – in the playground [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] is always 'guarded' by at least three other children. It would almost seem as if [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] is building the foundation of a very young army...
I am glad that my [child_of_destiny.GetSonDaughter] is making friends, I suppose?
Ominous, children should not act like this...
Finally, [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] is mine! Now, how do I wish to rule over my new subjects? Should I impose my beliefs and traditions upon them, or should I adapt to their culture and morals?
I shall adopt both their traditions and faith!
I will adopt their traditions, but I will not abandon [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
Their faith speaks to me... adopting it could further my plans.
I will not change, they will have to get used to me!

Ever since I was a child I dreamt about this moment, to seize a crown and name myself [Root.GetTitle], and now it has finally come true! But my ambitions know no bounds – for as long as I live, I shall conquer. My name shall be known across the world, and my legacy will last for millennia!
I have seized my destiny, though it does not end here!

A great conqueror by the name of [child_of_destiny.GetFirstNameWithNick] has invaded and taken over the realm of [child_of_destiny.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. [child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] is a [child_of_destiny.GetManWoman] of unrivaled ambition, with eyes set on the rest of the known world. Time will tell if [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] will build an empire to rival that of Alexander the Great himself, or if [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] will march [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] army into oblivion in the Gedrosian desert...

I thought I was going to rot in prison forever, until I heard a voice outside my cell. "Be very silent, I am getting you out of here!" the voice whispers. It is [savior_target.GetFullName], come to save me!
No, I quite like it here.

During the night, [child_of_destiny.GetFullName] escaped from my dungeons! [child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] was apparently helped by [savior_target.GetFullName], who has joined [child_of_destiny.GetHerHim] at [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] court.

[child_of_destiny.GetFullName], who was imprisoned by [jailer_target.GetFullName], has escaped during the night! [child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] was apparently helped by [savior_target.GetFullName], who has joined [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] court.

I know that the key to success lies in who I let close to me. No great [child_of_destiny.GetManWoman] ever reached the top without having at least a couple of loyal friends by their side – and I intend to choose only the most useful of people to stand by my side. There are many people clamoring for my attention, but who should I encourage?
Someone powerful, to aid me if I need help.
Someone in a position to further my goals...
Someone wise and clever, to provide counsel.
I do not like either of these people.

Lying in my bed I glance out through the open window. In the stars I can see my destiny, the soft light dancing in front of my eyes – telling of the many adventures I will have, the friends I will make, and the Kingdoms I will rule. It is comforting to know that the stars align just for me.
When I am older I will seize what is mine, but for now I will rest.

No matter the weapon: sword, axe, mace or spear – I am unmatched in a duel. Many have tried to best me, and few have ever succeeded. My reputation reaches both far and wide – I am known for my skill, my tenacity, my cunning and my ruthlessness... Come the day, I would even defeat [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] in personal combat!

I feel the power of [GetWarriorLodgeSymbol] flowing through my veins, as I snarl at the enemy commander, visibly startling [enemy_commander.GetHerHim]. "Surrender!" [enemy_commander.GetSheHe] shouts. "I am [enemy_commander.GetBestName], and-" The [enemy_commander.GetManWoman]'s words are cut short by my weapon [GetWeaponSwinging] through [enemy_commander.GetHerHis] throat.
Haha! I will mount your head on my [Root.GetCapitalHolding] walls!

My commander [home_commander.GetBestName] has been reported to perform impressively [battlefield_location.GetInOn] the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain] of [battlefield_location.GetName]. Most recently, rumor has it that [home_commander.GetSheHe] ruthlessly decapitated an enemy commander, before immediately [home_commander.GetRidingMarching] onwards, to face [home_commander.GetHerHis] next foe.
I think a reward is in order!

My [home_liege.GetRootRelation] [home_liege.GetTitledFirstName] is apparently thoroughly impressed by my battle technique. A missive I have received speaks at length about my bravery, and of people telling stories about the decapitation of [enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName] for years to come.

I am staring down the [home_commander.GetEnemySoldierDesc] enemy commander, trying to gauge what on earth [home_commander.GetHerHis] armor actually consists of. Are those... rat pelts? My thoughts begin to trail off and I proceed to demand [home_commander.GetHerHis] surrender. But then suddenly the world is spinning, and someone shouts: "Dodge for the flying head!".

My commander [enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName] has been slain [battlefield_location.GetInOn] the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain] of [battlefield_location.GetName]. "Decapitated, my [Root.GetLordLady]", the courier says, shuddering. "It was [home_commander.GetTitledFirstName], from [home_commander.Society.GetName]", he continues, averting my eyes.
And you just left [enemy_commander.GetHerHim] in the [battlefield_location.GetGroundDesc]?!
Aaargh! I will personally take care of that brute.

[From.GetBestName] did not appreciate the fate [enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName] met with at the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName], and has sworn to take matters into [From.GetHerHis] own hands. All this fuss over head on a pike?

[From.GetBestName] must not have heard how I refused to take the head of my enemy as a trophy, because I am told that the [From.GetManWoman] has sworn to take vengeance on me, for the fate [enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName] met with at the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName].
Even though I left [enemy_commander.GetHerHis] skull in the [battlefield_location.GetGroundDesc]?

On our way to the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain] of [battlefield_location.Capital.GetName], a huge boulder blocks our path. Having been [GetRidingMarching] for days, my muscles are aching for a real challenge. "Recruit!", I bark at a young [Root.GetBoyGirl] carrying a weapon far too big for [Root.GetHerHis] hands. "Hand me that hammer."
Let's do something about this rock.

On our way through the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain], a gigantic boulder blocks our path. Commander [From.GetTitledFirstName] is arguing at length with [From.GetHerHis] officers about whether we should try [GetRidingMarching] around the river crossing or not, when suddenly I hear them shouting my name, gesturing in my direction with a huge hammer.
Finally! Let's do something about this rock.

[my_fellow_commander.GetTitledFirstName] is a belligerent commander, fighting with the strength of a [GetRandomMythologicalCreature]. Not that anyone is keeping count, but I find myself wondering how many enemies [my_fellow_commander.GetSheHe] has taken down single-handedly at this point... "Save some for me, will you?" I call across the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain].
Pssh, what a show-off! It's not that hard!

Commander [From.GetTitledFirstName] keeps throwing me looks across the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain], as I am [GetWeaponSwinging] my way through our enemies. Just as I begin to get uncomfortable by the surveillance, [From.GetSheHe] calls out: "Save some for me, will you?"
Nothing like the smell of bloodshed in the morning!
You do me too much honor, [From.GetTitledFirstName].
Haha, of course! Aaah, this is so invigorating!

Nostalgia comes easily in the soft light of a campfire. Last night, one eager soldier blessed us with a riveting tale of the battle that claimed the life of my [target.GetRootRelation], [target.GetBestName]. As I am [GetRidingMarching] onto the battlefield today, I let the past fuel my resolve.

In the light of the campfire, my men often talk about heroes of old. Last night, one of them blessed us with a fabulous tale of the battle that claimed the life of [target.GetBestName]. I never gave it that much thought, but [GetRidingMarching] onto the battlefield, I find myself lingering on the story.

It was long ago I felt so good about being in charge of a regiment. Today, while lying in wait for an ambush, one nervous officer confessed that there was a time when the stories about my command were all over [home_capital_province.GetName]. "It's what made me vow to join the [Root.Culture.GetName] army, my [Root.GetLordLady]", [Root.GetSheHe] murmurs.

I remember hearing the stories from [home_capital_province.GetName], about the command and leadership of [target.GetBestName]. "It is important to have role models", I said at the time. Today, I look out over my regiment, thankful for all the great leaders that came before me.
You're saying *I* am the reason you became a soldier...?
Now they all look to me.

"If [target.GetTitledFirstName] drank from the skulls of [target.GetHerHis] enemies?" I ask. The recruit nods eagerly. I laugh, putting my arm around [Root.GetHerHim] conspiratorially: "Of course, there is a secret chamber back home in [home_capital_province.Capital.GetName], where [target.GetSheHe] is rumored to have bathed in their blood". The recruit grows pale.
You're never gonna let that story go, eh?
Have you heard the one about [target.GetFirstName] and the horse...?
Come out, come out, where you are!
Aaah, the sound of bone and resolve cracking before me... Invigorating!
May [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] care for all these souls.
I guess my [commander_to_the_rescue.GetRootRelation] was trying to impress me...?
Why do such a foolish thing, [commander_to_the_rescue.GetBrotherSister]...?!
Fortune does not always favor loyalty.
Fortune does not always favor the brave.
In this case, I am your executioner.

The enemy commander [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] is not playing fair, and has me completely cornered up against a [battlefield_location.GetTreeRockFence]. Behind [other_combatant.GetHerHim], a group of [other_combatant.GetHerHis] soldiers are moving closer. They are laughing, mocking me, thirsting for blood...

I cannot believe what is happening, but with each swing of [other_combatant.GetHerHis] [other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon] [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] is getting closer and closer to winning this fight. Jumping back to avoid yet another frighteningly lucky blow, I find myself backed up against a [battlefield_location.GetTreeRockFence].
W-wait, I surrender! Take me captive instead!
So this is how it all ends...

It seems that the enemy commander [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] actually expected me to play fair when [other_combatant.GetSheHe] chased me down on the battlefield. "Just you and me!" the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] demanded, sword held high. My men quickly joined me in taking the fool down.
They will all learn to fear me!

"W-wait! I yield!" [From.GetTitledFirstName] cries out. My [Root.GetDuelWeapon] high, I slow the deadly blow about to come down on my enemy. The [From.GetManWoman] scrambles backwards, almost tripping over [From.GetHerselfHimself]. "I'll be your prisoner! Spare my life!" [From.GetSheHe] whimpers.
I think I prefer you dead.

In the heat of the battle, my commander [From.GetTitledName], has been slain in one-on-one duel, between [From.GetHerHim] and [FromFrom.GetBestName]. It is said the [From.GetTitledFirstName] tried to surrender, but to no avail.

In the middle of battle I catch sight of a [my_dear.GetBoyGirl] wearing the same colors I am. I just have time to notice the fierce expression on [my_dear.GetHerHis] face, when [my_dear.GetSheHe] is struck down. I feel a pang of guilt, realizing how much [my_dear.GetSheHe] reminded me of my [my_dear.GetRootRelation] [my_dear.GetFirstName].

During the battle I catch sight of a [my_dear.GetFaceDescription] [my_dear.GetManWoman] who looks a lot like my [my_dear.GetRootRelation] [my_dear.GetTitledFirstName]. Then [my_dear.GetSheHe] is struck down. Suddenly, I am pushing soldiers out of the way, hurrying over to where I saw [my_dear.GetHerHim] fall. I know it is not [my_dear.GetFirstName], but I cannot help myself...!
We must remember to tend to our wounded.
There is no time to take *breaks*! For [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], chaaarge!
The old wound has finally healed, leaving a pretty grotesque scar behind. Some fresh air and walks in the [Root.Location.GetTerrain] surrounding [Root.Location.GetName] was all I needed!
I am starting to think the physician who looked at my injury was mistaken. The wound from the maiming has healed completely! Maybe it was all a trick of the light?

My injuries were extensive, but not enough to break me. Waking up this morning, I straighten my back. "This pain is temporary" I declare to my servant, who is watching me incredulously. The demons will have to try harder before [Root.GetTitledFirstName] surrenders to self-pity.

All my [Root.GetBrotherSister]s of [Root.Society.GetName] know that infections are best treated with a calming poultice, good sleep, and fresh air. I am not surprised to find that the foul smell is gone from my wound, leaving but a pale scar behind.

"Someone get me an axe!" I roar. The crowd gasps as I start swinging it around me, some scrambling in panic to get out of my way. One brave soul, [kinslayer_target.GetTitledFirstName], steps in front of me, accepting the challenge. When we are done, we are laughing heartily. "I like your rage, [Root.GetBrotherSister]!" [kinslayer_target.GetSheHe] says, wiping the sweat from [kinslayer_target.GetHerHis] brow.

"Someone get me an axe! NOW!" I roar to the closest soldier I can find. In the corner of my eye, I see my [kinslayer_target.GetRootRelation] [kinslayer_target.GetTitledFirstName] watching me. As I start swinging the weapon around, the rush of combat fills me. I find myself smiling, then laughing, from the bottom of my belly. [kinslayer_target.GetFirstName] is laughing too, and the crowd cheers me on.

"Give me your axe! NOW!" I roar at the recruit. The young [Root.GetBoyGirl] obeys and the crowd around me gasps as I start swinging it around me, some scrambling to get out of my way. "[Root.GetFirstName], what are you doing?!" my [kinslayer_target.GetRootRelation] [kinslayer_target.GetFirstName] yells in despair, clutching at [kinslayer_target.GetHerHis] bloodied tunic.
Aaah, I shall be the scourge of our enemies!
Aaah, by [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]! You are a small sacrifice for my new-gained strength!
I was just... Curses, someone help us out here!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] apparently went on a wild rampage through [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetCapitalHolding], and my poor [kinslayer_target.GetRootRelation] [kinslayer_target.GetTitledFirstName] was caught in the crossfire!
I will not let this insult stand!
My [kinslayer_target.GetRootRelation] should have known to stay out of the way.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has sworn vengeance upon me, for the loss of [kinslayer_target.GetTitledFirstName]. I... don't suppose [From.GetSheHe] would accept it if I sent a courier to explain that it was an accident?
I am sure we will settle this, in time...
Warriors from the area surrounding [target_holding.Capital.GetName] flock to my banner, and the [target_holding.GetCapitalHolding] garrison is bursting with new recruits!

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]! 

As members of [Root.Society.GetName] we strive to better ourselves and each other! One way is the occasional sparring match, for practice and honor.
Seek out and duel the [duel_target.GetSocietyRank] [duel_target.GetFirstName] – you will find [duel_target.GetHerHim] in [duel_target.Location.GetName].

Signed, [From.GetTitledFirstName]

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]! 

[Root.Society.GetNameCap] have been watching you, and I believe it is time for us to meet in the sparring ring. A [duel_target.GetSocietyRank] cannot afford to get rusty! What say you? Will you seek me out for an honorable duel?
I will be waiting for you in [duel_target.Location.GetName].

Signed, [From.GetTitledFirstName]

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]! 

As members of [Root.Society.GetName] we must always be ready for a fight. To prove your mettle, seek out and duel [duel_target.GetTitledFirstName], a [duel_target.GetSocietyRank] of [duel_target.Society.GetName] – until blood stains your weapons! May only one of you walk away from it still breathing.

Signed, [From.GetTitledFirstName]

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]! 

As members of [Root.Society.GetName] we must always be ready for a fight. To prove your mettle, seek out and duel [duel_target.GetTitledFirstName] – until blood stains your weapons! May only one of you walk away from it still breathing. You shall find [duel_target.GetHerHim] in [duel_target.Location.GetName].

Signed, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
The untimely death of §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! means I fail my mission to duel [From.GetHerHim]. [Root.Society.GetNameCap] will find something else for me to do.
§Y[FromFrom.GetTitledName]§! suffered an untimely death before we could see to our duel. I'll have to approach [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName] anew.

"Our table is already full, [Root.GetSocietyRank]. Are you saying you want to fight me for the spot?" [combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName] rises from [combatant_2.GetHerHis] seat, idly cracking [combatant_2.GetHerHis] knuckles and taking a step towards me.
A duel? Yes, that is what I am saying.
Oh, my [combatant_2.GetLordLady], you misunderstand! I did not mean to imply... I, uhm... *gulp*

Hail, [From.GetSocietyRank]!

You have proven yourself worthy of [Root.Society.GetName]. I admit defeat and hereby step back from the title you may now acquire – use it well. 

Signed, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetTitledFirstName]

Hail, [From.GetSocietyRank]!

While we mourn the loss, know that by defeating [combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName] you have more than proven yourself worthy of the title you wished to acquire – use it well.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetTitledFirstName]

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]!

It was a valiant effort, but given the result of our duel, we cannot with good conscience let you advance to the next rank within [Root.Society.GetName]. I suggest you see more battle or spend some time in the training grounds.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetTitledFirstName]
I would be angry, if I wasn't so humiliated...

I could have sworn I heard the enemy commander [enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName] barking orders, but as I search the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain] [enemy_commander.GetSheHe] is nowhere to be found. A fellow soldier finally informs me that [enemy_commander.GetSheHe] has been spotted cowering in the far back behind a [battlefield_location.GetTreeRockFence], and most disgracefully, behind [enemy_commander.GetHerHis] troops.
Aah, how lovely! I shall duel the Commander myself!
There you are! I have been itching for a fight!
I will let everyone know of [enemy_commander.GetHerHis] cowardice!

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]!

I must admit, I have been wondering when you are finally going to be honest with me and attempt to seize my lands. In fact, allow me to issue a formal challenge to you: if you covet [my_war_target.PrimaryTitle.GetName], come and claim it!

Signed, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
My mission to wage war against §Y[defender_target.GetTitledName]§! is no longer applicable. [Root.Society.GetNameCap] will find something else for me to do.

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]!

Congratulations on your successful conquering of new territory! Tonight, we all raise our drinks in your honor! For [Root.GetTitledName]!

Signed, [lodge_hero.GetTitledFirstName]

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]!

Your fellow members of [Root.Society.GetName] have received word that you did not fully seize control of the contested territory, but that it was not for lack of trying. May [Root.GetWarriorLodgeSymbol] bring you better fortune in the future.

Signed, [lodge_hero.GetTitledFirstName]

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]!

From every battle there is a lesson. Let us take solace in the thought that our fallen brothers and sisters dine with [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] tonight, and that you may one day find vengeance for this bitter defeat.

Signed, [lodge_hero.GetTitledFirstName]

"For [Root.Society.GetName]!" I proclaim, raising my glass. The cheers around the table are boisterous and the air hangs heavy with anticipation. "There is nothing left here to conquer!" someone laughs. Raising an eyebrow conspiratorially, [fellow_hero_1.GetFirstName] murmurs: "Have you ever been to [target_title.GetName]?"
Capital idea, [fellow_hero_1.GetFirstName]! Let's seek out fighters in [target_title.GetName].
A group of heroes begin preparing for a journey into the realm of §Y[target_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]§!. For blood and glory!\n
I am quite comfortable here in [Root.Capital.GetName]...

[original_hero.GetTitledFirstName] has declared that the highest ranking members of [Root.Society.GetName] are to go on an adventure, into [target_ruler.PrimaryTitle.GetName], the lands of [target_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]. After the cheers have gone around the table, I am left with my thoughts.
Terrific initiative! It is about time we earned our names as warriors!

[giving_member.GetTitledFirstName] approaches me, as I am poring over some maps of [target_title.GetName]. A servant alerts me to [giving_member.GetHerHis] visit, and as I glance up from the table, I notice they are carrying something wrapped in fine fabric. "For the battles to come", the [giving_member.GetManWoman] says, without further ceremony.
I will make certain this is put to good use, [giving_member.GetBrotherSister]!
Oh, this is far too generous. I shall pay you for it!
I think you need this more than I, [giving_member.GetFirstName].
I would rather focus on my personal training.

To bolster [fellow_member.GetHerHis] confidence for our adventure into [target_title.GetName], I am showing [fellow_hero_1.GetTitledFirstName] around my trophy room. "You are... a collector of skulls then", the [fellow_hero_1.GetManWoman] comments, before interrupting [fellow_member.GetHerselfHimself]: "Oh, but this one would make a fine chalice!".
Yes, I'll have someone fashion a cup out of one of these.
Actually, staring into its hollow eyes gives me great comfort as is.

Out [Root.GetRidingMarching] with [fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName], my eagle by my side, the [fellow_member.GetManWoman] showers both me and my bird with compliments. "You make a great team", [fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName] concludes.
You are right. [Root.GetSheHeCap] is always there for me.
Actually, it is just a bird.

As I am soon to be off into the lands of [target_title.GetName], my [Root.GetMyMarshalName] [marshal_character.GetTitledFirstName] is concerned for our troops being without leadership. "Might I suggest you leave your [target_artifact.GetName] behind, as a token of your continued guidance?" [marshal_character.GetSheHe] offers. "If nothing else, you should have that thing sharpened, my [Root.GetLordLady]" [marshal_character.GetSheHe] frowns.
The weapon could use some love, I suppose.
Sharpen it! I'll inform the troops of the confidence I have in you.
I trust you will take good care of it, [Root.GetMyMarshalName].
I am not letting anyone else touch this weapon.

The time has come for us to move into enemy territory. [fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName] and I are toasting once more, to [Root.Society.GetName]. "We shall find their most experienced warriors, and show them what it means to be [Root.Culture.GetName]!" I declare. "Everyone shall know our name!" [fellow_member.GetSheHe] agrees, slamming [fellow_member.GetHerHis] fist into the table.
The glory will be all mine!

We are camped [target_ruler.Capital.GetInOn] the [target_ruler.Capital.GetTerrain], on our way to [target_title.GetName]. While I am scouting the perimeter, I hear the sound of fighting. As I lean out from behind a [target_ruler.Capital.GetTreeRockFence], I spot a [my_duel_target.GetManWoman] wrestling a [target_ruler.Capital.GetRegionalBigAnimal]! And winning...!
A challenge! *clears throat* Hey, you! Yes, you! Let's fight!
This one looks too big for me...

Having spent the evening drinking and talking around the campfire with my traveling companions, I finally bid them good night. On my way back to my sleeping spot, I pause. Nearby, leaning against a [target_ruler.Capital.GetTreeRockFence], is a [my_duel_target.GetManWoman] tending to nature's call. "An enemy!" I yell, more surprised than alarmed.
Oh, excellent! I will duel this one!
I should just leave you be, I think.

Walking through the streets of a village in [target_ruler.Capital.GetName], the locals seem eager to point out how foreign I am. They have clearly never seen a [Root.GetManWoman] like me before, and while some are adoring my armor and confident stride, it does not take long before I encounter open hostility. "Go home!" one [my_duel_target.GetManWoman] barks.
You want to say that to my face? Let's fight!

Having turned in for the night, I find myself wide awake listening to the snoring of [fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName]. Just as I am about to get up and do something about my irritation, I hear a rustling in the bushes. Before I can get to my feet, I find a [my_duel_target.GetManWoman] leaning over me, eying me suspiciously, a weapon aimed at my throat.
You come armed, I see... How about we do this one on one?

"The finest warrior around? Well, that would be [my_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName], [Root.GetMasterMistress]", a little [Root.GetBoyGirl] says. [fellow_member.GetFirstName] fishes a coin from [fellow_member.GetHerHis] pockets, rewarding the urchin for the information. "There [my_duel_target.GetSheHe] is!" the child suddenly cries, pointing at a [my_duel_target.Culture.GetName] [my_duel_target.GetManWoman] down the street.
Aah, such fortune! My [my_duel_target.GetLordLady]! Come face me!
... On second thought, perhaps this one is for you, [fellow_member.GetFirstName]?
A challenge! I will duel this one!
You are entitled to your opinion, I suppose.
This is becoming too dangerous for me.
[From.GetTitledName] has perished during [From.GetHerHis] adventurous journey through foreign lands. Everyone who fought alongside [From.GetHerHim] know that [From.GetSheHe] died a warrior.

The [target_ruler.Capital.GetRegionalBigAnimal] dead on the ground, the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] braces for my attack. I call out: "For [Root.Society.GetName]!", my [Root.GetDuelWeapon] swooshing, nay, singing through the air. With the trees as our audience, and only witness to my deed, I have soon seen to [other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow].

Albeit under the influence, the battle stance comes naturally to me. My opponent staggers backwards in surprise, almost tripping over the [target_ruler.Capital.GetTreeRockFence]. Before [other_combatant.GetSheHe] has time to catch up, I [Root.GetKillingBlow].

I draw my weapon, without hesitation. The crowd scatters around us and my opponent and I fall into circling one another. The ensuing fight is more even than I care to admit. At the end, I am sending a quiet prayer to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], as I take in the cheers of our audience, and slam my weapon against [other_combatant.GetHerHis] head.

As soon as the camp is out of earshot, my opponent draws [other_combatant.GetHerHis] weapon. Wind moves over the moonlit meadow, the grass bending in waves, causing it look as if the ground itself is breathing, under our feet. "This is too easy", I murmur. Then I [other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow].

[fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName] motions for people to get out of the way, just before [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] lunges at me, indignity on [other_combatant.GetHerHis] face. I parry immediately, defending myself well, judging by the excited cheers of our spectators. At the end of it all, the crowd has grown still, the streets flowing with the blood of their [other_combatant.Culture.GetName] warrior.

"You must be lost!" I proclaim, drawing my weapon. I sway a little, internally cursing the alcohol in my veins. The [other_combatant.GetManWoman]'s face darkens, and I swallow. A scout! A spy? My mind races. "Your liege knows we are here then?" I demand to know, but my opponent has already slashed my guts open. "You heathen drunk", [other_combatant.GetSheHe] mutters.

"You want me to DUEL you?", the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] mocks, rolling [other_combatant.GetHerHis] eyes. The next thing I know, I am under a furious flurry of attacks, only barely keeping up with my opponent. A young girl screams as I collapse into the crowd, bloody and unable to stand any longer. "Inform [target_ruler.GetTitledFirstName], that the heathen troll is dead", is the last thing I hear.

I hear birds. It must be dawn, I think to myself. Why does my face feel cold, my limbs frozen...? Tensing, I cannot move. What happened? We fought on a meadow, the moon was guiding me, and... I fell. That blasted scout skewered me, with [other_combatant.GetHerHis] sword. Oh [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], welcome me to your side...

[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] seems to be flying towards me, swinging [other_combatant.GetHerHis] weapon vigorously. [fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName] pulls a small child out of our way, and yells for the crowd to step back. My opponent's technique appears more focused on showmanship than actual swordplay, and I find myself drawn in by the spectacle. Then suddenly, [other_combatant.GetHerHis] weapon sinks into my chest.

[From.GetTitledName], your [From.GetRootRelation], has left this earthly realm, but tales of [From.GetHerHis] adventures are all around us. The memory of the [From.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] warrior-[From.GetManWoman] is sure to live on, if not in the hearts of [From.GetHerHis] companions, so in the blood of [From.GetHerHis] family.\n\nA hero has left us.

They say that everyone in the [From.GetCapitalHolding] of [From.Capital.GetName] spent several moons preparing for the return of [From.GetTitledName]. The [From.GetManWoman] has been the main source of interest and fascinating rumor since even before [From.GetSheHe] left for [target_title.GetName], but reports all agree that the pomp is well deserved. As [From.Society.GetName] celebrate this warrior's victory, we pray that our young find this living legend an ideal worthy of emulating.
May we all share in [From.GetHerHis] glory.

Having wreaked havoc in the realm of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], the warrior scoundrel [bloodline_founder.GetTitledName] has been carving a name for [bloodline_founder.GetHerselfHimself] in blood. Our records will remember that [bloodline_founder.GetSheHe] and [bloodline_founder.GetHerHis] band of warriors have taken great pleasure in cutting their way through our countryside, fighting any willing man or woman who dared stand in their way, leaving traumatized children and devastated villagers in their wake...
It is the way of barbarians.

Wings brushing my shoulder, dark eyes trusting me. I... I must have been dreaming about hunting with my eagle. "My [Root.GetLordLady]! I tried to stop it, but it just flew in through the [Root.GetChamberOpening]!", an embarrassed servant blurts as I rub my eyes, realizing I can still hear the gentle cawing of a bird.
What do we have here? A new friend?
Get that thing out of my chambers!

Training with my soldiers, I find myself distracted by an excited barking from the barracks. "What *is* that noise?", I finally demand to know. My sparring partner lowers [Root.GetHerHis] weapon and clears [Root.GetHerHis] throat: "It was going to be a surprise, my [Root.GetLordLady], but we got a new puppy..."
I... I *have* been missing a companion...
Do I look like I have time to raise another dog? Come on, raise your weapon!
It was an honor to serve with you, friend.
I must survive, so I can compose a ballad of my trials!
Let me sing you the one about the idiot [enemy_liege.Culture.GetName]...!
Ooh, insults? I know a song, mocking [enemy_liege.GetTitledFirstName].
Hah! I will try to remember that one, for my next battle chant!
*gulp* Wait! Have you heard the one about the [enemy_liege.Culture.GetName] [enemy_liege.GetRegionalSmallGameAnimal]?
Come to hear me sing, have you?

[hero_character.GetTitledName] of [hero_character.Society.GetName] eyes me up and down, first skeptically, but then [hero_character.GetHerHis] posture relaxes. "Say, my [Root.GetLordLady]... Are you related to [founder_target.GetTitledFirstName]?". I nod, smiling. "That [founder_target.GetManWoman] is a legend!" [hero_character.GetSheHe] laughs. "I look forward to seeing you in action", [hero_character.GetSheHe] adds, squeezing my shoulder.
Legendary or not, I'm itching for a duel, my [hero_character.GetLordLady].

[From.GetTitledName] has volunteered as my opponent. I am uncertain what [From.GetSheHe] thinks of my lineage, and judging from the whispers surrounding us as we shake hands, so is [From.GetSheHe]... "Best of luck to you both!" [hero_character.GetBestName] says, shooting [From.GetFirstName] a reassuring glance. I let go of [From.GetManWoman]'s grip, noticing the sweat of [From.GetHerHis] hand.

[papal_attacker.GetTitledName] has declared a war on [From.GetTitledName]. Proclaiming the Pope a traitorous impious leader of the [papal_attacker.Religion.GetName]s, [papal_attacker.GetTitledName] want to return the Holy See back to its roots, to once more be led by a true [From.Religion.GetGroupName].\n\n[papal_attacker.GetSheHeCap] is leading [papal_attacker.GetHerHis] men from [papal_attacker.Capital.GetName] to [From.Capital.GetName], to depose the impious [From.GetTitledName] and turning the bishopric of Rome over to someone more fit to rule. With the war for who will rule over the [From.Religion.GetName]s at hand, every man, woman and child need to find out which side they will support.
We will protect our faith from the unjust!
I hope [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] will take the right side.

After the whole [ThePope.Religion.GetName] world has been through the turmoil of the fighting between the two sides, the Pope finally surrenders to [From.GetTitledName].

With the rise of the new [ThePope.GetTitledName], the church move past this dark chapter of its history and can once more become the beating religious heart of the [ThePope.Religion.GetGroupName] world.

[From.GetTitledName] and all those who joined [From.GetHerHim] in the fight against the old Pope are personally thanked by [ThePope.GetTitledName] for defending the faith.
But I preferred the old Pope...

After the whole [ThePope.Religion.GetName] world has been through the turmoil of the fighting between the two sides, [From.GetTitledName] finally surrenders to [ThePope.GetTitledName].

With the fall of the coalition who fought to restore the Holy See to its former glory, there is nothing that stands in the way of the continued impious attitude of [ThePope.GetTitledName].

[ThePope.GetTitledName] happily celebrates this victory over [ThePope.GetHerHis] opponents, and excommunicates all of them. The rest of the world is watching in horror, as the farce continues.
We will overthrow this fake Pope!
Maybe I should be more like [saint_person.GetTitledName]?

The last days have been filled with arguments back and forth. No matter what I try to tell [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetFirstName], it always ends up leading into another conflict.\n\nI wake up to my men searching all of [Root.Capital.GetName] for [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetHerHim]. It seems [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetSheHe] has left in the middle of the night, and fled the city. Though we surely have had our disagreements, I did not expect [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetHerHim] to simply run away.
Maybe I should not have said all those things...

I am strolling through the streets of [Root.Capital.GetName] when I notice the throngs of people rushing down to the harbor. Somewhat curious what might have happened, I tell my retainers we will make our way down there as well.

A grand ship unlike any I have ever seen is docked by the port, several [From.Culture.GetGroupName] flags hanging from the masts. I can see several guards rushing about the deck, as they are helping someone off the boat. As the [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.Capital.GetName], it is only right that I am the one to greet them.

An impressive looking [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetTitle] makes [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetHerHis] way off the ship, instantly locking eyes with me. With a smile, [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetSheHe] takes my hand and says "My [Root.GetLordLady], I need your help."

It has been some time since [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetTitledName] came to my court, and it has certainly been quite the experience having [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetHerHim] around. However, today [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetSheHe] came to talk to me about putting [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetHerHim] on the throne of Byzantium.\n\n"My dear [Root.GetLordLady], I know you have had your disagreements with the Empire. And of course, you would be well paid..." [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetSheHeCap] tells me. With some of the money I would receive from [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetTitledName], I could join the ongoing preparations for the Crusade and convince the other members to make this part of our goal.
Let us toast for this deal, my dear friend.
I rather not agitate the Empire.

In a passionate speech [From.GetTitledName] explains how all of us must gather our men to support [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetTitledName] for the throne of [e_byzantium.GetName]. The Emperors of [e_byzantium.GetName] have for a long time looked down upon the rest of us, pretending to be the descendants of the Romans. Now it is time to show them that we can overthrow the false Emperor in their midst as well.\n\nWith the gifts sent by [From.GetTitledName], [From.GetSheHe] has managed to convince the rest of the [From.Religion.GetName] realm to target Constantinople as part of the next Crusade.

It seems that interest for the Crusade towards Constantinople has become somewhat less interesting in most people's eyes, even going so far as to consider abandoning it. Maybe I should revitalize their interest?
Yes, I promised I would help after all.
I guess it just was not meant to be.
I will crush you, insolent traitors!
Hah! Let the wild dogs fight!

Once more [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has been at the forefront of the Crusade, single handedly bringing victory to the faith. Known throughout all the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] world as one of the most loyal and fierce [Root.Religion.GetName] there is, [Root.GetSheHe] is revered wherever [Root.GetSheHe] goes.\n\nRespect is showered upon [Root.GetTitledName] and [Root.GetHerHis] family, the legends and tales of their deeds will be brought down in history as the deciding factor of the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] victory in the face of adversity. There is no doubt the members of the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty will continue bringing the lost lands into the fold of the faith, and continue to be at the vanguard of the Crusades.

"Forward!" I shout as I cut down another of the men charging at me. "For [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]! To victory!"
At some point all my men seem to be pushed away, and I grit my teeth for the onslaught of incoming enemies. I can see their commander through the battle, sitting back on a horse with a grin on his face. If I am going down, I am bringing him with me. One cut follow another, and I see his grin slowly fade to a grimace as he tries to back out of the fight he is slowly being pulled into.

I look down upon the dead commander and his retinue as the rest of the battle is settling down. "My [Root.GetLordLady], are you all right?" One of my guards comes running over, looking across my bloodied body.
I am... More than all right.

[From.GetTitledName] has started planning a campaign against the pagans of the north. For too long, the pagans have been steadfast in their fights against the [From.Religion.GetGroupName]s, and [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to convert them with the sword.

The wild people of the north have started gathering in response, bellowing their battle hymns and demonic rituals, unstoppable in their frenzy. Surely, this will lead to a bloodbath on both sides, as neither will let the other be.

With a final blessing from [From.RelHead.GetTitledName], the armies of the Teutons leave the south for good.
Let them come, and be slaughtered.

[Root.GetTitledFirstName]

[northern_crusade_potential_target.GetTitledName] is a dangerous force to be reckoned with, and I agree with your assessment that [northern_crusade_potential_target.GetSheHe] needs to be dealt with. My troops are ready to march towards the [northern_crusade_kingdom_title.GetAdjective] lands.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Wait, I need to reconsider this.

[Root.GetTitledName]

We are ready to march our troops against [northern_crusade_potential_target.GetTitledName], but we will need monetary support for the campaign.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]

I agree [northern_crusade_potential_target.GetTitledName] is a dangerous foe, and we would need a base for our campaigns against the [northern_crusade_kingdom_title.GetAdjective] lands.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName].

The Teutonics march towards [northern_crusade_kingdom_title.GetAdjective] lands, to secure it for Christianity. The pagans have had too long to convert peacefully, now they will be taken by the sword.

Their first goal is to take out [northern_crusade_target_character.GetTitledFirstName], the warlord of [northern_crusade_target_character.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName]. If they secure [northern_crusade_target_character.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName], they will use it as a base to quell the rest of the [northern_crusade_kingdom_title.GetAdjective] lands.

The blood of the pagans will flow through the rivers of the north, no mercy will be shown.
What will the [From.Religion.GetName]s think of next?

The city of Antioch was originally raised by Seleucus in Alexander's time, and was under [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] control for centuries before the infidel onslaught took control of it. Finally, you have restored the ancient city to its true glory.\n\nWith Antioch back in Christian hands, it is only a matter of time before all of ancient Christendom will be returned. The rest of the world is watching, as I am the forerunner of what is to come.
Watch as I take the Holy Land back.

The island of Cyprus stands at the precipice of the Holy Land, and with its return to the fold of Christianity, the path to the Holy City has once more opened.

I have raised the new banner of Cyprus for the first time, and I look east to the lands of Jerusalem and Antioch. For too long, those lands were controlled by the enemies of the cross, but no more.

This is just the first of many victories. Everything will return to [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] hands.
We will retake the Holy Land, one piece at a time.

For a long time the city of [Root.Capital.GetName] has flourished. Our grasp reaches across the Mediterranean, our traders rich and powerful in their roles.

The Feudal rulers of Europe has looked down upon us for centuries, but it is finally coming to an end as our potential for greatness is undisputed. The time of the old nobility is about to pass, and the mercantile era is beginning with the rise of our merchant class.

Watch, my friends, my rivals, my countrymen, as I show the world the true strength of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].

The [From.GetDukeDuchessCap] [From.GetFirstName] of [d_osterreich.GetName] has started calling [From.GetHerselfHimself] the [From.GetArchdukeArchduchessCap] of [k_austria.GetName], and over time it has become normal to accept [From.GetHerHis] superiority over the other princes and princesses of the Empire. In a grand ceremony in [From.Capital.GetName], the title has finally become official.\n\nAs one of the prime electors of the Empire, [From.GetTitledName] has proved [From.GetHerHis] superiority beyond a shadow of a doubt. The other lords and ladies of the Empire have grudgingly accepted it, looking towards [From.Capital.GetName] in envy. They will look for any opportunity to take [From.GetHerHim] down and raise their own positions.

The [From.GetDukeDuchessCap] [From.GetFirstName] of [d_osterreich.GetName] has started calling [From.GetHerselfHimself] the [From.GetArchdukeArchduchessCap] of [k_austria.GetName], and over time it has become normal to accept [From.GetHerHis] superiority over the other princes and princesses of the Empire. In a grand ceremony in [From.Capital.GetName], the title has finally become official.\n\nAs one of the prime [From.GetLadiesLords] of the Empire, [From.GetTitledName] has proved [From.GetHerHis] superiority beyond a shadow of a doubt. The other inferior members of the Empire have grudgingly accepted it, looking towards [From.Capital.GetName] in envy. They will look for any opportunity to take [From.GetHerHim] down and raise their own positions.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has gathered all the [k_bavaria.GetAdjective] and [k_carinthia.GetAdjective] lands in under [From.GetHerHis] rule, and has raised the banner of a new Kingdom of [k_eastern_marches.GetName] to celebrate [From.GetHerHis] victories. This new Kingdom has become the new defacto leader of all the old eastern marches of the Empire.\n\nThis new Kingdom in the Empire is expected to be a power to be reckoned with. The old lands of [k_bavaria.GetName] and [k_carinthia.GetName] were well known for their strength and fortitude, and it is expected the new Kingdom will be all that and more.
An impressive feat, to be sure.

Once more the grand Byzantine banners of Constantinople have been raised. [From.GetDynName] has restored the old crown lands of Byzantium, and the Greek Empire rises from the ashes of defeat, to conquer its old enemies in both the east and the west.

The Eastern Roman Empire suffered defeat after defeat, finally falling to the throng of hostile states at its borders. But like the Rome of old, its enemies could not keep it from growing in power and becoming a relevant actor once more.

The Byzantine Empire is one and indivisible, all hail [From.GetTitledName].
I will serve the true leader of Rome!
Every new beginning comes from some other beginning's end.

Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName]!
It feels me with hope and dedication towards the future, to once more see the Byzantine banners raised. If it would please you, I would do my utmost to serve you in these challenging times to come.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
I need to decide where to situate my new Kingdom. The old eastern margravates were all well known and powerful, and my decision will set certain expectations of what to come.
[c_osterreich.GetName] and the old margravate of Austria.
[d_styria.GetName] is well known for its strength.
[k_bavaria.GetName] has always been the center of this region.
[k_carinthia.GetName] has a long fruitful history behind its name.

Since the rise of the Prophet in Arabia, the Muslim faith has been a strong independent actor throughout the lands. [From.GetTitledFirstName] put an end to that, and the Muslim faith has been shattered by the latest advances of the [From.Religion.GetName]s.\n\nIn a grand announcement in front of [From.GetHerHis] castle in [From.Capital.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstName] declared all the infidel faiths dead, and that all the previous believers would be given a choice to convert to the true faith, or fear the [From.Religion.GetName] faith as it would crush them as it did the Muslims. Nowhere is safe from the Crusaders of [e_outremer.GetName].
We have to beware the Christians...

The [d_knights_calatrava.GetName] is the most recent addition to the soldiers of the Cross, founded by the magnanimous [From.GetTitledName].
