Perhaps we should try this again in the future...
[child_hero_mentor.GetBestName] has approached me today, offering to put my [GetFromRelation] through an intensive training session, hoping to improve [From.GetHerHis] dueling skills.
I think it's still a bit early for that.

I spent most of the afternoon training with dull weapons with [child_hero_mentor.GetBestName] under my [GetFromRelation]'s watch. It was not easy to keep up with such a good and harsh teacher. I might have collected quite a few bruises, but I also learned several interesting new moves.

Ever since my [recruiting_parent.GetRootRelation] forced me to join [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName], I have had not a single day of peace. Being a fighter is simply too much of a bother to me. All of these training sessions have been an unbearable chore to go through.

Ever since my [recruiting_parent.GetRootRelation] forced me to join [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName], I have had not a single day of peace. My new playmates are illiterate brutes, forcing me to perform the most humiliating tasks. I wanted to become a scholar, not a fighter!

Ever since my [recruiting_parent.GetRootRelation] forced me to join [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName], life has been a constant torment for me. I am a [Root.GetManWoman], my place is not on the field of battle, needlessly risking my life!

Ever since my [recruiting_parent.GetRootRelation] forced me to join [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName], life has been a constant torment for me. All of this talk of duels and war is too much for me to bear. I do not really have the stomach to be a fighter.
[recruiting_parent.GetRootRelation], I do not want to be a warrior anymore!
Still, I must obey my [recruiting_parent.GetRootRelation]'s wishes.

My [GetFromRelation] has confronted me today about my decision to have [From.GetHerHim] join [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] claims that the training is too hard and [From.GetSheHe] does not feel like [From.GetSheHe] is fit to be a warrior.

My [GetFromRelation] has confronted me today about my decision to have [From.GetHerHim] join [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] claims that the art of war does not appeal to [From.GetHerHim] and [From.GetSheHe] wishes to be a scholar instead.

My [GetFromRelation] has confronted me today about my decision to have [From.GetHerHim] join [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] claims that fighting is simply not a [From.GetManWoman]'s job, and demands that I allow [From.GetHerHim] to leave the Lodge.

My [GetFromRelation] has confronted me today about my decision to have [From.GetHerHim] join [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] claims that the prospective of fighting other people makes [From.GetHerHim] uneasy and jittery. [From.GetSheHeCap] hopes I could reconsider my decision to make [From.GetHerHim] become a warrior like myself.
You are my [GetFromRelation], and you will obey me!
If this is what you wish...

My [GetFromRelation] did not take well my request. [From.GetSheHeCap] yelled at me that it is my duty to become a warrior like [From.GetHerHim] and that [From.GetSheHe] will not tolerate any insubordination on my part.

Since our last fight, [From.GetFirstName] has been very gloomy, barely even speaking to me or any of [From.GetHerHis] friends. Forcing [From.GetHerHim] to keep training to be a warrior might have not been the best decision on my part...
But I did it for [From.GetHerHis] own good!

Far from obeying my decision to become a warrior, [From.GetFirstName] has decided to flee [Root.Capital.GetName]! And, as if that wasn't enough, my [GetFromRelation] stole as much [From.GetSheHe] could carry from my treasury before leaving.
How could [From.GetSheHe] do this to me?

Since our last fight, [From.GetFirstName] has been very gloomy, barely even speaking to me or any of [From.GetHerHis] friends. Yet, I could have never imagined that forcing [From.GetHerHim] to keep training would have led [From.GetHerHim] to take [From.GetHerHis] own life.
A coward to the end, I see...

I have recently heard news of my [GetFromRelation] from [From.GetHerHis] exile. [From.GetSheHeCap] now lives in [From.Capital.GetName], spending [From.GetHerHis] eating and drinking, with no accomplishments to [From.GetHerHis] name.

I have recently heard news of my [GetFromRelation] from [From.GetHerHis] exile. [From.GetSheHeCap] now lives in [From.Capital.GetName], and has become a frail, soft-spoken bookworm, buried in a moldy library, with no accomplishments to [From.GetHerHis] name.

I have recently heard news of my [GetFromRelation] from [From.GetHerHis] exile. [From.GetSheHeCap] now lives in [From.Capital.GetName], and has become a frivolous, vapid courtier, sniveling at the feet of better people.

I have recently heard news of my [GetFromRelation] from [From.GetHerHis] exile. [From.GetSheHeCap] now lives in [From.Capital.GetName], and has become a paranoid loner living at the edge of society, barely tolerated by [From.GetHerHis] peers.

I have received a vision from the Holy Ghost.\nOur Lord has ordered me to take up arms, rally the faithful and march on the Holy Land to take it away from the vile grasp of the infidels desecrating its hallowed grounds.

I feared that my [GetFromRelation]'s desire to free the Holy Land would lead [From.GetHerHim] to an unfortunate end.\n[From.GetFirstName] is gone. All the children and peasants who had flocked to [From.GetHerHis] banner have scattered to the four winds. They lament the loss of their beloved leader, still unable to grasp why would God allow [From.GetHerHim] to be killed before accomplishing [From.GetHerHis] divine task.\nYet, I can at least take the solace in the fact that, as unfortunate as [From.GetFirstName]'s death was, it has undoubtedly saved the lives of countless people, who would have otherwise followed the child into the maws of certain doom at the hands of the infidels.

With the death of [From.GetFirstName], [From.GetHerHis] misguided attempt to lead a Crusade to the Holy Land will never come to pass. All the children and peasants who had flocked to the banner of this [From.GetBoyGirl] have scattered to the four winds. They lament the loss of their beloved leader, still unable to grasp why would God allow [From.GetHerHim] to be killed before accomplishing [From.GetHerHis] divine task.\nAs unfortunate as [From.GetFirstName]'s death was, it has undoubtedly saved the lives of countless people, who would have otherwise followed the child into the maws of certain doom at the hands of the infidels.

By permanently getting rid of [From.GetFirstName], I have ensured that [From.GetHerHis] misguided attempt to lead a Crusade to the Holy Land will never come to pass. All the children and peasants who had flocked to the banner of this [From.GetBoyGirl] have scattered to the four winds. They lament the loss of their beloved leader, still unable to grasp why would God allow [From.GetHerHim] to meet an untimely end before accomplishing [From.GetHerHis] divine task.\nAs unfortunate as [From.GetFirstName]'s fate was, it has undoubtedly saved the lives of countless people, who would have otherwise followed the child into the maws of certain doom at the hands of the infidels.
Such a violent end, for such a young [From.GetBoyGirl]...

By capturing [From.GetFirstName], I have put a stop to [From.GetHerHis] misguided attempt to lead a Crusade to the Holy Land.\n\nThe child languished in my dungeons, and [From.GetHerHis] foolish followers have already started to scatter to the four winds, unable to fathom why God would allow their beloved leader to be stopped so easily.
[From.GetSheHeCap] will stay locked until [From.GetSheHe] has learned [From.GetHerHis] lesson.

With the untimely capture of [From.GetFirstName] by [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], the [From.GetBoyGirl]'s attempt to lead a horde of zealots to recapture the Holy Land for Christendom has been foiled. The child's followers have swiftly scattered to the four winds after the loss of their beloved leader, unable to comprehend why God would allow [From.GetFirstName] to be stopped so easily before succeeding in [From.GetHerHis] divine quest.

Something has happened to my beloved [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName].

[From.GetSheHeCap] claims that the Holy Ghost visited [From.GetHerHim] last night, ordering [From.GetHerHim] to take up arms, gather all the true followers and lead a Crusade against the infidels who are desecrating the hallowed soil of Jerusalem.

[From.GetSheHeCap] has even had the gall to demand money, weapons and troops from me to show my support to this sacred quest of [From.GetHersHis]. [From.GetSheHeCap] will not listen to reason and is very determined to leave [Root.Capital.GetName] immediately.

[From.GetFirstName], a child from [Root.Capital.GetName] has caused quite the commotion today, when [From.GetSheHe] demanded an audience with me, claiming that the Holy Ghost appeared to [From.GetHerHim] in dream last night, ordering [From.GetHerHim] to take up arms, gather all the true followers of Christ and lead a Crusade to free the Holy Land.\n\n[From.GetSheHeCap] concluded [From.GetHerHis] sermon by commanding me to provide [From.GetHerHim] with money, weapons and men to help [From.GetHerHim] fight against the infidels in the name of Our Lord.
You will have my full support!
I will dispatch some men to protect you.
I will give you some food for the travel.
Oh, absolutely! I will ship you to the holy land myself!
You are dead to me. Leave and never return!
Guards! Throw this blithering fools out!
If this is what you desire, I will not hold you.
Do whatever you wish, it is of no concern to me.

News have reached us that a [FromFrom.GetBoyGirl] from [FromFrom.Capital.GetName] has received a vision from the Holy Ghost, compelling [FromFrom.GetHerHim] to pick up arms, gather the true followers of Christ and lead a Crusade against the infidels who desecrate the sacred soil of Jerusalem.\nThe [FromFrom.GetBoyGirl] has gathered many followers amongst the peasantry and has embarked on great journey to reach the Holy Land, claiming that the sea itself will open at [FromFrom.GetHerHis] passage.
Such a wild imagination, even for a child...
May [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] show [childrens_crusade_leader.GetHerHim] the way to victory!
Could this child be a messenger of the Lord?

The ragtag army of [childrens_crusade_leader.GetFirstName] has reached [Root.Capital.GetName]. As if the parade of dirty peasants and screeching children hadn't already caused enough problems, their unlikely leader has requested an audience with me, claiming that I should provide supplies and lodging for [childrens_crusade_leader.GetHerHis] holy warriors.
Your words have moved me! I will support you.
Oh, I will find you a place to stay...
Guards! Remove these urchins from the premises!
I am afraid we have no food to spare.

The ragtag army of [childrens_crusade_leader.GetFirstName] has reached [Root.Capital.GetName]. As if the parade of dirty peasants and screeching children hadn't already caused enough problems, their unlikely leader has requested an audience with me, claiming that I should provide troops and armaments for [childrens_crusade_leader.GetHerHis] holy quest.
I will do much more than that!
Very well, I will grant you some of my men.
You can see if any of my subjects are interested in your cause.
Do not worry, I know just who to call...
What sort of joke is this? Guards!
I am afraid we have no men to spare on hopeless quests.

Ever since the ragtag army of [childrens_crusade_leader.GetFirstName] has reached [Root.Capital.GetName], I have received no shortage of complaints from [child_outraged_priest.GetTitledFirstName] regarding how heretical this Crusade is, and how I should make an example of its young leader to prevent my subjects from falling to [childrens_crusade_leader.GetHerHis] sinful words.
But [childrens_crusade_leader.GetSheHe] is the chosen of Our Lord!
Worry not, [child_outraged_priest.GetFirstName]. I will make these pesky children disappear.
I will have my guards beat them out of [Root.Capital.GetName].
Let us not concern ourselves with them, shall we?

Ever since the ragtag army of [childrens_crusade_leader.GetFirstName] has reached [Root.Capital.GetName], I felt drawn to the words of its leader. Jesus surely speaks for [childrens_crusade_leader.GetHerHim].

Tragedy has struck me! My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName], swayed by the words of [childrens_crusade_leader.GetFirstName], has decided to flee [From.GetHerHis] home to join the Children's Crusade.
I must follow them to protect my [GetFromRelation]!
How could [From.GetSheHe] do this to me!

[From.GetFirstName] claimed that the tides of the Mediterranean Sea would split open at the arrival of [From.GetHerHis] army, allowing [From.GetHerHis] warriors to cross unscathed and march all the way to the Holy Land.\nUnfortunately, the Lord did not fulfill the promise made to the young Crusader, and now the large force of peasants and children languishes in Genoa, looking for a way to travel to Asia.\nSome of the less determined members of the Crusade have already lost their faith, but [From.GetFirstName] remains strong in [From.GetHerHis] conviction, persuading new, hopeless recruits every day.
They could use more troops for protection.
I will allocate some resources to help them buy a passage.
I can spare some money to send them some food.
I will pray that they soon find a passage.
They are still in time to return home.

After having finally managed to book a passage through the Mediterranean Sea in order to reach the Holy Land, the Children's Crusade has been forced to an unfortunate detour to Greece after their ships crashed on the coasts of Achaia after a terrible storm. Reports from the army are scant, although there are rumors saying that many have started to doubt [From.GetFirstName]'s leadership. \n\nAnd yet, this unlikely horde of youths and peasants is still marching on towards Jerusalem.
They are surely in need of more supplies!
I must reiterate my support to strengthen [From.GetFirstName]'s authority.
I will dispatch letters to the local authorities to send them on the correct path.
I can only hope they will persevere.
Perhaps the Lord does not wish them to reach the Holy Land...

Despite all adversities and many attempts to undermine [From.GetHerHis] divinely-inspired leadership, [From.GetFirstName] has been able to march [From.GetHerHis] army all the way to Nikaea. \nWith the Holy Land finally within reach, the Crusaders' resolve has been strengthened. Their leader is certain that the infidels will not dare to raise their arms against them once they realize their holy mandate, and instead will open the doors of Jerusalem at their very arrival.

Despite all adversities and many attempts to undermine [From.GetHerHis] divinely-inspired leadership, [From.GetFirstName] has been able to march [From.GetHerHis] army all the way to Nikaea. \nWith the Holy Land finally within reach, the Crusaders' resolve has been strengthened. \n[From.GetFirstName] has sent me a message, thanking me for my continued support during the campaign, and asking me any further help I am able to provide [From.GetHerHim] with in order to prevail against the infidels. With my help and God's blessing, [From.GetSheHe] is certain of victory against the abominable heathens.
When the time comes, I will join in battle with you!
I will allocate more resources to support your fight.
I can only offer you my most sincere prayers.
There is not much else I can do, I fear.

After receiving a vision of the Archangel Gabriel, who helped [From.GetHerHim] lead [From.GetHerHis] army through the treacherous path leading to Outremer, the children of [From.GetFirstName] have miraculously managed to reach Antioch before being spotted by the infidels.\nIn spite of the [From.GetBoyGirl]'s claim that the infidels would forsake the Devil upon their very arrival without the need for a fight, the heathens occupying Jerusalem have begun mobilizing their army, ready and eager to slaughter the innocent souls marching against them, in order to protect their ill-gotten land.\nThe world will soon see whether [From.GetFirstName] was truly blessed by the Lord.

After receiving a vision of the Archangel Gabriel, who helped [From.GetHerHim] lead [From.GetHerHis] army through the treacherous path leading to Outremer, the children of [From.GetFirstName] have miraculously managed to reach Antioch before being spotted by the infidels.\nIn spite of the [From.GetBoyGirl]'s claim that the infidels would forsake the Devil upon their very arrival without the need for a fight, the heathens occupying Jerusalem have begun mobilizing their army, ready and eager to slaughter the innocent souls marching against them.\nThe world will soon see whether [From.GetFirstName] was truly blessed by the Lord, or if I was unwise to put my trust in this child.
[From.GetFirstName] will not fight this Crusade alone!

It appears that whatever impetus had driven so many to follow [From.GetFirstName] has dissipated. The Children's Crusade is no more, its army scattered and broken, its main supporters dead or missing.\nThe leader [From.GetHerselfHimself], [From.GetFirstName], still convinced to be the messenger of the Lord, is now derided by most as a raving lunatic who spends most of [From.GetHerHis] days yelling at people from street corners, lamenting about the depravity of the Church and the nearing end of our world.
It was bound to happen sooner or later.

Facing against the concrete threat of a heathen army, the Children's Crusade shattered in a thousand crying pieces.\nWithout proper leadership, equipment, or trained soldiers, [From.GetFirstName] was unable to stand against [From.GetHerHis] foes. Despite being able to lead [From.GetHerHis] followers all the way to the Holy Land, [From.GetHerHis] dreams of a Christian Jerusalem will go unfulfilled.\nAbandoned by most of [From.GetHerHis] supporters, the [From.GetBoyGirl] has been sold into slavery, alongside many other children captured by the infidels after their defeat.

An insane child, clearly under the influence of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName], has managed to reach Jerusalem at the head of a large army of beggars and youths, claiming that it is [From.GetHerHis] sacred duty to retake the Holy Land in the name of [From.GetHerHis] god.\nWhile the number of gullible fools who have fallen for this [From.GetBoyGirl]'s words is alarming, the idea that a mob of starving peasants will be capable of defeating a mighty [Root.Religion.GetName] army in open battle is laughable.
We will slaughter them like lambs.

Facing against the concrete threat of a heathen army, the Children's Crusade shattered in a thousand crying pieces.\nWithout proper leadership, equipment, or trained soldiers, [From.GetFirstName] was unable to stand against [From.GetHerHis] foes. Despite being able to lead [From.GetHerHis] followers all the way to the Holy Land, [From.GetHerHis] dreams of a Christian Jerusalem will go unfulfilled.\nThe heathens slaughtered all of the adults who were foolish enough to follow [From.GetHerHim] and captured the children in the army, selling all of them as slaves.
Such a tragic yet predictable end...

As was expected, the fools who entrusted their lives in the hands of a child were promptly slaughtered by the armies of the faithful.\nThis Crusade against Jerusalem was bound to be short-lived and one-sided. Our enemies had no skilled commanders, no weapons, no armors, no siege engines, no food... That they were able to reach their destination in the first place was something of a miracle by itself.\nThe few survivors amongst the children have been sold into slavery, never to return to their homeland.
There could be no other end to this war.
I can no longer deny it! God is with [From.GetHerHim]!
I wish for [From.GetHerHis] reign to be long and prosperous!
I guess I should have trusted [From.GetHerHim]...

My attempt to change the regular die with a weighted one did not pass unnoticed. After a bit of squabbling, [random_society_winner.GetBestName] manages to pick the die away from me and throws it on the table a few times, revealing my intent and calling me a cheater.
How about we consider it even?
I will make it up to you in some way, I promise!

Unfortunately, I was too indiscreet with my leg, and several warriors noticed my attempt to move the die after it was cast. After a bit of squabbling, I am forced to accept defeat and recognize that [random_society_winner.GetBestName] has won the bet.

Despite the other warriors not noticing me kneeing the table, fate played me for a fool and I ended up accidentally pushing the die away from [Root.GetWLDieBetName], much to my disappointment. [random_society_winner.GetBestName] smiles triumphantly, crossing [random_society_winner.GetHerHis] arms and demanding me to pay up.

A moment of silence falls upon our group as the die rolls from my hand and bounces a few times on the table, rolling to a halt to show the face of [Root.GetWLDieName]. As the realization catches [random_society_winner.GetHerHim], [random_society_winner.GetBestName] cheers triumphantly, immediately asking me for [random_society_winner.GetHerHis] money.

After the money from the first bets exchanges hands, I pick up the die and cast it again, trying to throw it exactly in the same way. The die rolls around the table and finally stops, showing the face of [Root.GetWLDieName]. As the realization catches [random_society_winner.GetHerHim], [random_society_winner.GetBestName] cheers triumphantly, immediately asking me for [random_society_winner.GetHerHis] money.

After the money from the first bets exchanges hands, I pick up the die and cast it again, trying to throw it exactly in the same way. The die rolls around the table and finally stops, showing the face of [Root.GetWLDieName]. As the realization catches him, one of the other warriors cheers triumphantly, immediately asking me for his money.

[From.GetBestName] and I spent last evening playing dice games with some of the other warriors in the main hall. Fortune did not smile to [From.GetFirstName], and by the end of the night, I had managed to empty [From.GetHerHis] purse quite a bit.

[From.GetBestName] and I spent last evening playing dice games with some of the other warriors in the main hall. Fortune did not smile to [From.GetFirstName], and by the end of the night, [From.GetSheHe] begged me to call in the favor I owned [From.GetHerHim], just to avoid paying all of the debt [From.GetSheHe] had accumulated.
Perhaps you should not bet what you do not have?

[From.GetBestName] and I spent last evening playing dice games with some of the other warriors in the main hall. Fortune did not smile to [From.GetFirstName], and by the end of the night, [From.GetSheHe] begged me to ask [From.GetHerHim] anything else rather than paying all of the debt [From.GetSheHe] had accumulated.
I will think about this favor you owe me...

Tonight, the mead hall has been inflamed by rumors of a great wolf wandering through the forests near [Root.Capital.GetName]. The man who spotted the beast claims that it is without a doubt one of Fenrir's sons, escaped from its frozen prison. The older members of the Lodge agree that, as the [Root.GetLordLady] of [Root.Capital.GetName], it is my duty to track down and slay this beast.

Tonight, the mead hall has been inflamed by rumors of a great wolf wandering through the forests near [Root.Capital.GetName]. The man who spotted the beast claims that it is without a doubt one of Medeina's cohorts, driven mad after tasting human flesh. The older members of the Lodge agree that, as the [Root.GetLordLady] of [Root.Capital.GetName], it is my duty to track down and slay this beast.

Tonight, the mead hall has been inflamed by rumors of a rabid werewolf wandering through the forests near [Root.Capital.GetName]. The man who spotted the beast claims that it is without a doubt one of Lycaon's descendants, hiding during daylight in human form and hunting under the moonlight. The older members of the Lodge agree that it is my duty to track down and slay this beast.

Tonight, the mead hall has been inflamed by rumors of a great eagle terrorizing the farmlands of [Root.Capital.GetName]. The man who spotted the beast claims that it is without a doubt one of Perun's children, driven mad after tasting human flesh. The older members of the Lodge agree that, as the [Root.GetLordLady] of [Root.Capital.GetName], it is my duty to track down and slay this beast.

Tonight, the mead hall has been inflamed by rumors of a great eagle terrorizing the plains of [Root.Capital.GetName]. The man who spotted the beast claims that it is the companion of a legendary hunter, driven mad after tasting the flesh of his own master. The older members of the Lodge agree that, as the [Root.GetLordLady] of [Root.Capital.GetName], it is my duty to track down and slay this beast.

Tonight, the mead hall has been inflamed by rumors of a great eagle terrorizing [Root.Capital.GetName]'s countryside. The man who spotted the beast claims that it is the companion of a legendary hunter of the steppe, driven mad after tasting the flesh of his own master. The older members of the Lodge agree that, as the [Root.GetLordLady] of [Root.Capital.GetName], it is my duty to track down and slay this beast.

Tonight, the mead hall has been inflamed by rumors of a great bear skulking in the forests near [Root.Capital.GetName]. The man who spotted the beast claims that it is an ancient spirit guardian of these lands, driven mad after tasting human flesh. The older members of the Lodge agree that, as the [Root.GetLordLady] of [Root.Capital.GetName], it is my duty to track down and slay this beast.

Tonight, the mead hall has been inflamed by rumors of a great lion terrorizing the plains of [Root.Capital.GetName]. The warrior who spotted the beast claims that it is the reincarnation of an evil spirit and a known eater of men. The older members of the Lodge agree that, as the [Root.GetLordLady] of [Root.Capital.GetName], it is my duty to track down and slay this beast.

Tonight, the mead hall has been inflamed by rumors of a great lion terrorizing the plains of [Root.Capital.GetName]. The warrior who spotted the beast claims that it is a demon sent by Ahriman to torment us. The older members of the Lodge agree that, as the [Root.GetLordLady] of [Root.Capital.GetName], it is my duty to track down and slay this beast.
I would have nobody but you by my side, [loyal_hunting_partner.GetFirstName].
The man is raving. There is no such a beast.

Before we leave for this perilous journey to slay the monster that is menacing my subjects, I should make an offering to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to make sure I am shielded from the preternatural powers of the creature.
I will burn the best cattle from my stock.
I will offer something of value for a safe journey.
A small offering is all I need.

The time has come for us to leave the safe confines of civilization and venture forth into the dark domain of the monster plaguing my lands. With [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] and [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s protection, I am sure to track down this creature and put an end to the threat it poses to my subjects once and for all.

The time has come for us to leave the safe confines of civilization and venture forth into the dark domain of the monster plaguing my lands. With [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s protection and my keen hunting skills, I am sure to track down this creature and put an end to the threat it poses to my subjects once and for all.

Our long search for the mysterious beast has led [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] and I on some dangerous, unmapped paths. It takes only a second of distraction before I find myself grasping for something as I fall from a cliff-side.
There must be something I can grab!

My sight wavers for a moment, I feel my heart stop and my teeth jitter as the clouded sky spirals above me and I catch a glimpse of the jagged rocks waiting beneath me. I feel a sudden pain crossing through my chest and fear for the worst, but then I realize it is caused by [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] pulling me from my arm and dragging me back to safety.
I will never forget your gesture, [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName].
At least you are good for something, I suppose...

As I hang on the precipice, struggling to crawl back to the path, I watch helplessly as [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] looks back at me. It takes me to call [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim] several times before [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetSheHe] finally unfreezes and comes to my help. Whether it was for cowardice or malice, my own companion has nearly left me to die!
I can never trust [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim] ever again.
How could you just stand there?!
Let us see if you have better balance...
I must kill [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim] before [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetSheHe] tries to kill me again!
I should not be too hard on [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim], it was a difficult situation.

Our long search for the mysterious beast has led [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] and I on some dangerous, unmapped paths. It takes only a second of distraction before [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] loses [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHis] footing near the edge of a cliff, finding [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerselfHimself] grasping for something as [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetSheHe] starts falling.
Do not worry, I will save you!

[scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] struggles, desperately trying to take a firm hold of my hand. I tell [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim] to keep calm, pulling [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHis] arm up over the hill's edge. We both lay on the wild path for a while, breathing heavily. As soon as [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] has recovered enough to stand up, [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetSheHe] thanks me profusely for saving [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim].
I know you would do the same for me, my friend.
I would never let something happen to you, [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName].

[scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] struggles, desperately trying to take a firm hold of my hand. I tell [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim] to keep calm, pulling [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHis] arm up over the hill's edge. Yet, just as I am about to drag [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim] to safety, [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHis] hand slips and [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] falls screaming in the abyss below.
I will have to proceed alone.

The search for the great wolf has brought my expedition through a deep forest. Given that wandering aimlessly in a unmapped area would just be a waste of time and put us at risk of losing our own path, we are determined to find some trace of the beast before venturing any further.

The search for the great eagle has brought my expedition to the slopes of a barren hill. Given that wandering aimlessly in a unmapped area would just be a waste of time and put us at risk of losing our own path, we are determined to find some trace of the beast before venturing any further.

I will make sure that there are no stones left unturned.
I think I know where our quarry is hiding...
[scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] is better suited for this task.

The search for the great wolf has brought my expedition through a deep forest. It is not long before I stumble upon the half-eaten remains of the creature's last prey, a dismembered deer, floating in a crimson pond. I am certain that examining this carcass will grant me insight on this terrible beast I am trying to hunt down.

The search for the great eagle has brought my expedition to the slopes of a barren hill. I am certain that examining this carcass will grant me insight on this terrible beast I am trying to hunt down.

As I make my way through the wilderness, sharpening my senses to look for any trace of the creature, my mind keeps returning to the nature of the beast itself, and to any knowledge about its kind that I have acquired in my past hunts.

I have read much about this sort of beast.
There are a few clear ways to fell such a monster.
I am sure I know something...
[scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName]! Surely you must know something about this creature.

The search for the great wolf has brought my expedition through a deep forest. Our search bears little fruit when the night catches up with us. Having to find refuge from the darkness, we make our way to the shack of an old hermit. The man is not very talkative, but he does seem to know about the beast...

Having to find refuge from the darkness, we make our way to the shack of an old hermit. The man is not very talkative, but he does seem to know about the beast...

He must be the werewolf himself! Die, fiend!
Perhaps a few coins will loosen your lips?
You better talk now, old man!
Perhaps I can convince him to share his knowledge...
Maybe he will talk to you, [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName].

We will map the path as we move.
We will not get lost, my memory will not fail me.
Perhaps if we try marking our path?

The search for the great wolf has brought my expedition through a deep forest. Despite beginning this hunt with the most unwavering resolution, I am starting to feel uncertain of our chances of success. The journey to the creature's lair has been rife with weird signs and bad omens of the most grotesque and unsettling nature.

The search for the great eagle has brought my expedition to the slopes of a barren hill. Despite beginning this hunt with the most unwavering resolution, I am starting to feel uncertain of our chances of success. The journey to the creature's lair has been rife with weird signs and bad omens of the most grotesque and unsettling nature.

Despite beginning this hunt with the most unwavering resolution, I am starting to feel uncertain of our chances of success. The journey to the creature's lair has been rife with weird signs and bad omens of the most grotesque and unsettling nature.

Despite beginning this hunt with the most unwavering resolution, I am starting to feel uncertain of our chances of success. The journey to the creature's lair has been rife with weird signs and bad omens of the most grotesque and unsettling nature.
Nothing but superstitions! [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] is surely with us!
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] knows that my heart is pure.
These signs... There must be another way to interpret them.
[scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName], tell me, is there another way to interpret these signs?

The search for the great wolf has brought my expedition through a deep forest. Our foe may be fearsome, but our journey to its lair was filled with the most auspicious omens. It is quite clear that the spirits of the forest are welcoming our arrival and helping me in my quest to slay the monster haunting this land.

The search for the great eagle has brought my expedition to the slopes of a barren hill. Our foe may be fearsome, but our journey to its lair was filled with the most auspicious omens. It is quite clear that the spirits of the mountain are welcoming our arrival and helping me in my quest to slay the monster haunting this land.

The search for the great bear has brought my expedition through a dead wood. Our foe may be fearsome, but our journey to its lair was filled with the most auspicious omens. It is quite clear that the spirits of the forest are welcoming our arrival and helping me in my quest to slay the monster haunting this land.

The search for the great lion has brought my expedition to slopes of a thick patch of grassland. Our foe may be fearsome, but our journey to its lair was filled with the most auspicious omens. It is quite clear that the spirits of the plains are welcoming our arrival and helping me in my quest to slay the monster haunting this land.

I let [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] walk past me as I watch the sun set beyond the leafage of the dark forest we have reached in the search of the great wolf. [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] keeps [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerselfHimself] close to me, comforted by the presence of a fellow hunter by [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHis] side, and hopelessly unaware that the terrible beast that [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetSheHe] was set to slay was me.

[scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] and I have been out in the wild for several days now, with no trace of our quarry. As I take a moment to rest under the skeletal husk of a tree and look at my companion, scouring the terrain looking for clues, I am struck by a sudden realization. What if the monster has taken [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName]'s form to deceive me?
[scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetSheHeCap] will not live to tell the tale.
You will never take me alive!
No, [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] is too nice to be the beast.

We have searched for this elusive creature for weeks now, but to no avail. I was unable to find any trace of the great beast, and had to eventually resign myself to abandon the quest and head back to [Root.Capital.GetName]. Some of my fellow warriors were eager to hear of my story upon my return, expecting me to bring the head of the monster as a trophy, and most were quite disappointed to learn of my failure.

There are only a few rays of sunlight lingering over the forest's leaves when I am startled by the coarse howling of a wolf. I have barely the time to look around when the beast emerges growling from the foliage, its gray, sparse mane sprinkled with dried up blood, its yellow eyes staring me with soulless hatred.

When the shrieking battle cry of the eagle pierces my eardrums, making me startle, I am halfway through climbing a large rock formation. An imposing shadow sweeps over the uneven surface of the wall, aimed straight in my direction.

It is hard to tell what time is it, with most of the light blocked by the skeletal branches of the dead trees, but it cannot be too far from sunset when a threatening growl breaks the silence around me, announcing the arrival of a large brown bear. The beast tears down the rotten remains of a trunk as it makes its way towards me with bloodshot eyes and drooling jaws.

I am following the last set of tracks through a patch of tall grass, when a sudden rustle makes me suddenly stop. I cautiously glance on my left side, and immediately spot the fiery golden eyes of the lion. The beast, crouched on the ground with its jaws half-open, looks ready to pounce.
I have slain far bigger game than you!
You will die by my hand, fiend!

The great wolf is resting by a riverside, its long snout red with dried up blood. Finding the beast at its weakest gives us a considerable advantage against it, yet we must also be careful not to underestimate this formidable opponent, especially now that we are so close to succeeding in our quest.

The great eagle is tucked in its nest, its cruel hooked beak barely peeking from under its wings. Finding the beast at its weakest gives us a considerable advantage against it, yet we must also be careful not to underestimate this formidable opponent, especially now that we are so close to succeeding in our quest.

The great bear is resting by its cave, a grotesque mountain of flesh and dark brown fur soaked in filth and blood. Finding the beast at its weakest gives us a considerable advantage against it, yet we must also be careful not to underestimate this formidable opponent, especially now that we are so close to succeeding in our quest.

The great lion is resting under a tree, placidly looking at a the horizon. Finding the beast at its weakest gives us a considerable advantage against it, yet we must also be careful not to underestimate this formidable opponent, especially now that we are so close to succeeding in our quest.
I know exactly how to deal with it.
Now we can corner and gut this monster for good.
Finally! Death to the vile monster!
I am not sure about this anymore...

The great wolf fights to the very end, but we are soon able to corner it and pierce through its hide a few times. Keeping the creature at bay with our spears, and patiently wait for the bleeding to weaken it enough to strike again. I land the final blow through the wolf's skull, pushing the creature on the ground, finally vanquished.

I manage to wound one of the eagle's wings as it takes off, leaving the beast unable to flee. The eagle screeches and leaps furiously towards me, its talons grasping for my eyes, but I am able to push it away while taking only a few scratches. As the bird clumsily tries to take flight, I throw my spear through its chest, bringing it down for good.

When I charge the first strike, the bear's response is sluggish, but, the more I poke at it, the angrier the beast gets. Its hide is thick, so much so that I can barely pierce through it. Yet, I do not discourage myself, maintaining enough distance from my foe to avoid its attacks, hitting it repeatedly until it finally falls dead.

I barely escape the lion's pounce. Just as I slide past the jumping beast, I push my spear through its chest, getting pulled alongside it. The monster roars and claws at me, trying to get rid of the weapon, yet I keep a strong hold on it, pushing it further into the lion's flesh while avoiding its attacks, until the creature finally lays dead beneath me.
I will make a trophy out of it.
The sacred ritual of flaying must be performed.
I will bring the carcass back to my fellow warriors.
I think I hear something from the beast's nest...

The fight to slay the great wolf will be remembered by our fellow warriors for generations to come. The creature nearly killed me, assaulting us in a flurry of slashing claws and gnawing teeth, yet we persevered and overcame the monster, leaving its carcass bloody and broken by the riverside.

The fight to slay the great eagle will be remembered by our fellow warriors for generations to come. The creature nearly dragged me to a terrible death during its last assault, but, in the end, we were able to slay it, leaving it to fall screeching from the hill, its wings bloody and broken.

The fight to slay the great bear will be remembered by our fellow warriors for generations to come. The creature nearly crushed me under its massive weight, tearing down several trees in its frenzied drive to kill us, but, in the end, the bear's fury only quickened its bleeding, sealing its death.

The fight to slay the great lion will be remembered by our fellow warriors for generations to come. The creature nearly skewered me on multiple occasions during its desperate struggle, yet I was able to ignore the pain and focus on my assault, and finally manage to plunge my spear through its eye and put an end to its wicked existence.

Everything happens so fast I can barely react. The wolf grabs my arm within its jaws and drags me on the ground, shaking its head violently. I scream and punch the creature with my free arm, until it finally releases me. When I finally retake my senses and push myself up, soaked in my own blood, there is no trace of the wolf left.

Everything happens so fast I can barely react. The eagle's talons grab hold of my clothes, pulling me away from the cliff. I struggle and try to hit the beast, loosening its hold, but not before dooming myself to a harsh fall. When I finally awake, the great eagle is long gone.

Everything happens so fast I can barely react. The bear tramples me in its charge, slamming me against one of the dead trees. I scramble for my spear, and manage to throw it at the beast's head, causing it to falter for a moment. The bear roars and runs away, disappearing in the forest. Unfortunately, the beast's attack was devastating, to the point of making me unable to continue my pursuit.

Everything happens so fast I can barely react. The lion pounces me, crushing me under its massive weight, its terrible jaws snapping at my throat. By plunging my spear underneath its leg, I am able to stop the beast's assault and slip away. My counterattack was enough to make the lion retreat back in the tall grass. Sadly, my wounds prevent me from pursuing my quarry any further.

Everything happens so fast I can barely react. The wolf grabs my arm within its jaws and drags me on the ground, shaking its head violently. I scream and punch the creature with my free arm, but the wolf is relentless and, after momentarily losing its hold, it snaps its jaws on my throat.

Everything happens so fast I can barely react. The eagle's talons grab hold of my clothes, pulling me away from the cliff. I struggle and try to hit the beast, loosening its hold, but not before dooming myself to a deadly fall.
Everything happens so fast I can barely react. The bear tramples me in its charge, crushing me under its massive weight and leaving me a broken smudge in the middle of the dead forest.

Everything happens so fast I can barely react. The lion pounces me with unfathomable speed, slamming me on the ground and quickly closing its jaws around my neck. The creature's teeth swiftly crush my windpipe, leaving me to drown in my own blood.

Just as the wolf is about to strike, I swiftly push [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] directly into the beast's jaws, quickly turning around and running for my life as my companion is horribly mangled by the monstrous creature. My fellow warriors might think me a coward for leaving [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim] to die only to save myself, but I will at least be a living coward.

I duck as the eagle passes over me, and let myself fall on [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName]. My companion's body dampens my fall enough to make me stand up immediately after reaching the ground and run away as fast as my legs can take me, leaving behind myself both the terrible monster and [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName], cursing me for my cowardice as the beast already circles over [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim].

Just as the bear is about to strike, I swiftly push [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] directly into the beast's charge, quickly turning around and running for my life as my companion is horribly mangled by the monstrous creature. My fellow warriors might think me a coward for leaving [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim] to die only to save myself, but I will at least be a living coward.

Just as the lion is about to strike, I swiftly push [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] directly into the beast's jaws, quickly turning around and running for my life as my companion is horribly mangled by the monstrous creature. My fellow warriors might think me a coward for leaving [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim] to die only to save myself, but I will at least be a living coward.
I could never kill that thing!
I barely survived as it is!

The evil that had corrupted the sacred spirit of the bear has been cleansed through the shedding of our blood and the death of the creature. It is now our duty to consume its flesh and bury its bones so that this majestic beast can be born again. After completing our ritual, I leave the bear's skull on top of a tree and finally begin my journey back home.

My fellow warriors welcome my return triumphantly. With all the meat gathered from my hunt, we will be able to organize a large feast and celebrate my victory over the monster with all the pomp it deserves.

The squealing increases as I approach the eagle's nest. One of its chicks is hiding there, blind and featherless, squawking for food. The spawn of such a powerful beast could serve me well, if properly trained, serving me in future hunts and terrorizing my enemies.
The line of this monster must be extinguished.

Several months have passed since I took the great eagle's nestling after killing its terrible mother. The chick has grown strong and tame under my watch. Unlike its parent, it will spend its life serving men rather than hunting us down.
After years of loyal service and countless hunts, my eagle has finally taken to its last flight to join its ancestors in the Eternal Blue Sky.
All my court will be present at the funeral.
I will hunt the beast down by myself!
New warriors will soon start flocking to your banners.

A couple of fellow warriors help me constrain the majestic offerings that I have personally picked from my livestock for this occasion. While a a priest chants, I plunge the sacrificial dagger deep into the flesh of the first horse, letting its blood shower over my face. I turn around and the priests inscribe a few holy symbols on my face with blood and dirt.

With my champion dead, I have been left without a fighter to represent my dynasty's faith to the gods in the upcoming blood games. Still, there is a little time left, if I wish to find somebody else to rise up to the challenge.

When [Root.GetTitledFirstName] ascended to the throne at such an early age, few in [Root.GetHerHis] court expected [Root.GetHerHim] to last to adulthood.
Yet, in the end, it was [Root.GetHerHis] detractors that did not survive through the [Root.GetTitle]'s childhood.
Under [Root.GetHerHis] cheerful and playful appearance, the child demonstrated an unparalleled ruthlessness in [Root.GetHerHis] rise to power, meticulously eliminating all those that opposed [Root.GetHerHim]. 
Despite having long since shed the illusory semblance of innocence that allowed [Root.GetHerHim] to lure many of [Root.GetHerHis] victims to an untimely end, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has become infamous throughout the realm for [Root.GetHerHis] sanguinary childhood.

When [Root.GetTitledFirstName] ascended to the throne at such an early age, few in [Root.GetHerHis] court expected [Root.GetHerHim] to last to adulthood.
Yet, in the end, it was [Root.GetHerHis] detractors that did not survive through the [Root.GetTitle]'s childhood.
Under [Root.GetHerHis] cheerful and playful appearance, the child has demonstrated an unparalleled ruthlessness in [Root.GetHerHis] rise to power, meticulously eliminating all those that opposed [Root.GetHerHim]. 
No playmate of [Root.GetHersHis] dares to deny [Root.GetHerHim] a toy, no tutor dares to punish [Root.GetHerHim], dreading the murderous abyss behind [Root.GetFirstName]'s eerie smile.
Why would anybody be scared of playing with me?

Yet another victim has fallen to my murderous whims. As I look down at the corpse on the floor, I realize that I have managed to stack quite a considerable body count by now. Soon enough, one of my guards brings me back to the matters at hand, asking me what should be done with the remains.
Put it somewhere I can see it.

Far from being the least bit ashamed of [Root.GetHerHis] murderous inclinations, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has started to openly display [Root.GetHerHis] victims as a warning towards [Root.GetHerHis] enemies. \n[Root.GetSheHeCap] has dedicated an entire wing of [Root.GetHerHis] palace to host the embalmed corpses of [Root.GetHerHis] kills, propped by [Root.GetHerHis] servants around a large table, wearing fancy outfits, immortalized in an ever-expanding feast of death.\nMany travelers have left [Root.Capital.GetName] horrified after a visit through this horrifying room, spreading its infamous tale across the realm.
I am always glad to add more guests to the party.

As unassuming and welcoming as [Root.Capital.GetName]'s palace might look on the outside, few visitors enter it without a heavy feeling of dread clouding their minds.\nThe manor of the [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has become quite infamous for swallowing its guests without much warning. Nobody has ever found proof of the [Root.GetTitle]'s misdeed, or ever heard [Root.GetHerHim] order an execution, yet all [Root.GetHerHis] enemies have the alarming tendency to disappear in mysterious circumstances and never be heard from ever again...

It is hard to reconcile [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s charming reputation as a guest with [Root.GetHerHis] equally notorious thirst for blood.\nTold to be a nightmarish creature of darkness, the [Root.GetLordLady] of [Root.Capital.GetName] stalks [Root.GetHerHis] preys with skill and finesse, gaining their trust and toying with them until [Root.GetHerHis] boredom forces [Root.GetHerHim] to end the suffering of one victim and move to the next.\nProtected by [Root.GetHerHis] rank and power, this repulsive murderer has been able to terrorize [From.GetHerHis] lands for years, becoming infamous throughout the realm.
Could we not discuss this in private?

Few can boast to have accomplished as much as [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has at such a young age as [Root.GetSheHe] did.\nHaving ascended to power while still a child, this prodigious ruler has been able to lead [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] through a series of astounding victories against its neighboring realms. \nClearly, this child was born for war and conquest, and there is no telling what [Root.GetSheHe] will be able to accomplish during the rest of [Root.GetHerHis] life.

[Root.GetTitledFirstName] has risen as a shining example of knightly virtue that will not soon be forgotten.\nA paragon of gallantry and valor on the battlefield as well as at court, [Root.GetSheHe] is living proof that ruthlessness and deceit are no requirement to excel on the field of battle. With a pure heart filled with the glory of Our Lord and an unwavering discipline, tempered by countless battles and tournaments, the [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has triumphed over [Root.GetHerHis] enemies time and again, inspiring many young [Root.GetMenWomen] to follow in [Root.GetHerHis] footsteps and sing of [From.GetHerHis] legendary feats.
To protect the innocent and defend the defenseless!

Scarcely any ruler bordering [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] sleeps well at night, tormented by the dreams of conquest of their terrible neighbor. [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has carved a blood-soaked path through the lands of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], earning the fame of a ruthless and fearsome warrior.\n None is safe from [Root.GetHerHis] reach, and it is hard to say if [Root.GetHerHis] thirst for conquest will ever be satisfied. A cunning and relentless commander, [Root.GetSheHe] has overseen countless victories on the battlefield and acquired immortal glory for [Root.GetHerselfHimself] as well as all [Root.GetHerHis] descendants.

By emulating some of the greatest and wisest Kings of old, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has achieved a perfect balance between wisdom and grit, becoming both a scholar and a warrior, and applying the vast depths of [Root.GetHerHis] knowledge to lead [Root.GetHerHis] armies to countless victories and earn eternal glory for [Root.GetHerHis] dynasty.\nFew people can claim to have accomplished as much as [Root.GetSheHe] has within their lifetime, excelling both in spiritual and political disciplines to such an extent. \n[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s name will surely be remembered in many legends by future generations as that of a respected and fearsome warrior-philosopher.
Clarity of mind and firmness of intent.

With the child having ascended to the throne at such an early age, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s inheritance was initially perceived by many as the beginning of a period of instability and fear for the people of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Instead, the child [Root.GetTitle] ushered a new era of peace and prosperity throughout [Root.GetHerHis] realm, ruling firmly and kindly, and showing a wisdom far beyond [Root.GetHerHis] years.\nMost of [Root.GetHerHis] subjects now praise [Root.GetHerHim] for [Root.GetHerHis] enlightened rule, claiming that [Root.GetSheHe] must have been blessed by [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
A mere child led [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] to greatness.

Through my considered and cautious leadership, I have been able to maintain my realm at peace, both from external and internal threats, ensuring security and prosperity for all my subjects. Few rulers can claim the same dedication as I have shown, forsaking the lure of conquest to protect their people.
It is my solemn responsibility to keep them safe.
Rejoice! We will share our wealth with everyone!

[Root.GetTitledFirstName] has risen as a symbol of peace and prosperity for all the people of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].\nThrough diplomacy and intimidation, [Root.GetSheHe] has managed to maintain [Root.GetHerHis] realm at peace for as long as most people can remember.\n[Root.GetHerHisCap] tireless devotion to the protection of [Root.GetHerHis] subjects has earned [Root.GetHerHim] the respect of many and ensured that [Root.GetHerHis] dynasty will forever be associated with safety and tranquility, and [Root.GetHerHim] as the benevolent [Root.GetFatherMother] of the realm.
A prosperous and peaceful future is ahead of us!

[Root.GetTitledFirstName] has risen as a symbol of peace and prosperity for all the people of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].\nThrough diplomacy and intimidation, [Root.GetSheHe] has managed to maintain [Root.GetHerHis] realm at peace for as long as most people can remember, enriching both [Root.GetHerselfHimself] as well as [Root.GetHerHis] subjects.\nRather than waste lives and wealth after elusive victories on the field of battle, [Root.GetSheHe] has decided to share [Root.GetHerHis] riches with [Root.GetHerHis] subjects, in an endless cavalcade of feasts and fairs that have earned [Root.GetHerHim] the love and reverence of many people in [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] and beyond.
Life is short, let us celebrate!
The wonders of carpentry and engineering for the benefit of our people.

[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s tireless efforts in the construction of new fortifications aimed at the defense of [Root.GetHerHis] realm have immortalized [Root.GetHerHis] name as an ingenious and considerate planner.\n[Root.GetSheHeCap] has populated many of the hills of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] with impregnable embodiments of [Root.GetHerHis] wondrous technological ingenuity, projecting a sense of safety to all [Root.GetHerHis] subjects.\nFor some time now, [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has acquired a reputation as a realm of towers and stone walls, secure from even the wildest horde.
A strong defense is the best guarantee for safety.

In an unparalleled show of devotion, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has dedicated [Root.GetHerHis] life to the construction of sacred monuments honoring the glory of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].\nScarcely any town within [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] is beyond walking distance from a sanctuary of some sort, and every major city in the realm has come to host the majestic sight of a great cathedral.\nSeveral members of the clergy have celebrated [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s virtuous projects on multiple occasions, and the [Root.GetTitle] has become a symbol of craftsmanship dedicated to heavenly pursuit.
Through our works on Earth we are rewarded in the afterlife.

[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s name has become synonymous with war and mayhem.\nDriven by an insatiable thirst for blood and conquest, this [Root.GetManWoman] is said to possess both the ferocity of a lion and the cunning of a fox, pursuing [Root.GetHerHis] mad ambitions with no concern for mercy and honor.\n[Root.GetHerHisCap] infamous exploits and the vile tactics with which [Root.GetSheHe] has achieved many victories on the field have stained [Root.GetHerHis] dynasty forever.

Through [Root.GetHerHis] just and considerate rule, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has managed to maintain [Root.GetHerHis] realm in a state of peace and prosperity for several years.\nDespite being a distant and cold ruler, the [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has had a reign surprisingly devoid of malignant rumors or dissident factions.\nMost people assume that this is but the natural consequence of a wise [Root.GetManWoman] being in charge, yet an unspoken sense of uneasiness appears to loom over the people of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]...
A peaceful land, a quiet people.

A patron of the crafts, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has brought unparalleled fame to [Root.GetHerHis] family with [Root.GetHerHis] unfettered patronage of countless enterprises, overseeing the construction of new temples, castles and entire cities all across [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].\nThanks to [Root.GetHerHis] wise investments, the realm's wealth has been increased beyond measure, and for this [Root.GetSheHe] is sure to be remembered for generations to come.
A name as durable as the foundations of the realm.

Sacrifices must be made when creating something great.
No one more than [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has exemplified this concept during the course of [Root.GetHerHis] bloodied realm.
The [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] is celebrated as the founder of many marvels of modern architecture, yet [Root.GetSheHe] is also associated with several violent deaths and sinister plots.
It has become a common saying for the people of [Root.Capital.GetName] that any new building ordered by the [Root.GetTitle] is yet another tomb where [Root.GetSheHe] will hide the remains of [Root.GetHerHis] next victim.
A realm in peace and prosperity.
We must ensure the protection of our subjects.
Earthly conquests are meaningless before the glory of the heavens.
I will become a paragon of virtue!
I will bring prosperity and knowledge to my realm.
I will find my own path.
It is clear that only by cultivating an impeccable reputation I will be able to make the memory of my name stand the test of time.
I will be a just and virtuous ruler.
My dynasty's emblem will shine over all others.
[Root.Capital.GetName] will be a bastion of theological thought!
[Root.Capital.GetName] will be a capital of arts and philosophy!
Only through decisive action and by achieving complete control over my realm I will be able to immortalize my name for centuries to come.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] will show me the way to eternal glory!
I must be remembered, no matter how!

It has come to my attention that many of the realm's laws handling petty disputes are old and obsolete. Revising our legal system to provide fair and satisfying judgment will certainly improve the conditions of my subjects and increase the prestige of my dynasty.
I will lead this legal reform myself.
The most learned scholars in the realm will look into this.
I will try to revise the legal system myself.
I will be more careful during my court hearings.
This is too much effort for me...

The great legal reform of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] is finally reaching its conclusion, yet new issues seem to have stemmed by my undertaking. There is a growing concern amongst the nobility that these new laws are too lax and might encourage peasants to avoid their responsibilities and acquire seditious tendencies.
We must be patient in this transitory phase of the reform.
Perhaps my reform is too extensive...
I will try to address their concerns.
Better to scrap the entire reform then.

By revolutionizing the legal system of [Root.GetHerHis] realm, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has enshrined [Root.GetHerHis] name as that of a wise and benevolent ruler, ready to hear the plight of [Root.GetHerHis] subjects and administer justice with a firm but gentle hand.\n[Root.GetHerHisCap] dedication to equity and virtue have undoubtedly ensured [Root.GetHerHim] a place by [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s side and earned [Root.GetHerHis] dynasty a spot in history.

My dynasty has a large and proud history, yet I am sure by looking through the realm's records I will be able to find even more prestigious ancestors to adorn my family tree and increase my prestige and legitimacy.

Might be small, but I am sure that if I look hard enough through the realm's records I will be able to find enough prestigious ancestors to adorn my family tree and increase my prestige and legitimacy.
I will lead the research myself.
I will hire an entire group of scholars!
I can ask to my immediate relatives about it...
This is simply too much work.

Researching prestigious ancestors has helped me considerably to polish the reputation of my family, yet it is not enough. For our name to be remembered, we must endeavor to maintain a higher standard of behavior and class even today, despite our large numbers.

Researching prestigious ancestors has helped me considerably to polish the reputation of my family, yet it is not enough. For our name to be remembered, we must endeavor to maintain a higher standard of behavior and class even today, especially given the small size of our dynasty.
Each member of this family must be a paragon of nobility!
I will dedicate my entire life to this venture.
We must all do our part to immortalize our name.
I will try to dedicate more time to grooming...
I have greater responsibilities to attend to.

Thanks to the restless efforts of [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty has risen to fame amongst their peers as paragons of nobility and class.\n[Root.GetTitledFirstName] [Root.GetHerselfHimself] has become a symbol of parental responsibility and familial duty. A sophisticated [Root.GetManWoman] who has devoted [Root.GetHerHis] entire life to uphold the honor and virtue of [Root.GetHerHis] family's good name, [Root.GetSheHe] has become an example for all esteemed aristocrats to follow.

Thanks to the restless efforts of [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty has risen to fame amongst their peers as paragons of nobility and class despite its small size.\n[Root.GetTitledFirstName] [Root.GetHerselfHimself] has become a symbol of parental responsibility and familial duty. A sophisticated [Root.GetManWoman] who has devoted [Root.GetHerHis] entire life to uphold the honor and virtue of [Root.GetHerHis] family's good name, [Root.GetSheHe] has become an example for all esteemed aristocrats to follow.

In order to make [Root.Capital.GetName] a center of theological discussion, I must invest some resources to find notable scholars, acquire treaties of past theologians and build the infrastructure needed to host both. It will not be an easy or cheap endeavor, to be sure...
I will lead the search myself!
No price is too big to accomplish this holy quest.
A few notable scholars will be enough...
I will try to lead the search personally.
I did not think this task would require such costs.

Since I have started recruiting scholars and expanding the religious significance of my court, there has been a growing concern from the more conservative elements of the realm's clergy about the possibility that my research might undermine pre-existing religious practices.
I will need to discredit these people.
The findings of my scholars will speak for themselves.
I will divert some resources to reassure the opposition.
These people are simply envious of my achievements!
I dare not upset the clergy.
For a realm of integrity and virtue.

In order to attract artists and philosophers to [Root.Capital.GetName] I need to offer patronage and protection, as well as make sure that my court is an open space for free thinkers, one where they are able to express themselves and research new concepts without risk of punishment.
I will personally reorganize the court.
I should make known that artists are welcome here.
I will try to make the court a more welcoming haven for artists.
This task is too taxing for me.

Now that artists are finally starting to populate [Root.Capital.GetName] in great numbers, it is time for me to fund their activities and provide the books and materials they need to operate their craft.
I will lead the construction efforts personally.
A grandiose new library is what we need.
A large workshop should provide them with what they need.
I will host the best amongst them in my court permanently.
This is all well beyond my limited resources.

Having spent years of [Root.GetHerHis] reign sponsoring artists and philosophers within [Root.GetHerHis] realm, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has become famous as an enlightened patron of the arts, celebrated in poems, paintings and ballads all throughout [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] and beyond.\nKnown as a learned and charming personality, the [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has become the archetype of the philosopher [Root.GetKingQueen] of [Root.GetHerHis] age, a protector of all that is beautiful and metaphysical.
Art merely imitates the perfection of our world.
My path to eternal fame is clear. By cleansing my realm of all the impure, heretical influences that plague it and consecrate it to the glory of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
My subjects must understand the depths of their depravity.
All the priests [Root.Religion.GetName] must fall in line with my quest.
I will find sympathetic voices amongst the priesthood.
The people will know of my great plans!
This might be too risky to try...

Everywhere I turn I see a new abominable product of heresy. Licentious poems, grotesque paintings, works of fictions trivializing the tales of our holy texts and confusing the common folks of [Root.Capital.GetName]. I must put a stop to all this degeneracy.
I will lead the inquisitors myself!
All activities must be overseen by the righteous!
A few new inquisitors will correct the flock.
I will exile some of the worst offenders.
These measures might create too much discontent...

[Root.GetTitledFirstName] has become notorious for [Root.GetHerHis] staunch approach towards religion all throughout [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. At the head of an endless host of inquisitors and overseers, [Root.GetSheHe] has slowly replaced all the most peaceful members of the clergy within [Root.GetHerHis] realm with uncompromising fanatics. With their help, [Root.GetSheHe] has taken upon [Root.GetHerselfHimself] the holy task of cleansing all heretical inclinations from [Root.GetHerHis] subjects.

It has come to my attention that several old laws issued by less forward-thinking rulers than I are still plaguing the judicial system of our realm, imposing undue limitations to my authority as [Root.GetTitle]. How am I supposed to accomplish anything worthy of note when I am bound by the leftovers of a time long since forgotten?
I will revise the legal system myself.
I will hire scholars to look at and revise these laws.
My council will deal with this in due time.
These laws must have been created for a reason...

Ever since I started my legal reform, I have had an increasing series of people, petty noblemen and peasants alike, pestering me about the changes I am making to our laws. They claim that the reform is motivated by selfish motives, that I only wish to accumulate power and tyrannize over my subjects.
No matter, these dissenters will soon disappear...
A couple of burned villages will send the right message.
I will hire some mercenaries to guarantee impartiality.
Very well. I do not wish to risk a civil war.

In [Root.GetHerHis] greedy lust for power, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has turned many of [Root.GetHerHis] past followers away while losing [Root.GetHerselfHimself] into spiral of selfishness and tyranny.\nHaving lost any care [Root.GetSheHe] might have had for [Root.GetHerHis] subjects, [Root.GetSheHe] has focused [Root.GetHerHis] entire attention in accumulating more powers under [Root.GetHerHis] title and celebrating [Root.GetHerHis] alleged accomplishments as [Root.GetTitle].
The most magnificent [Root.GetTitle] of this time!

[scoped_guardian.GetFirstName] is such a bore! [scoped_guardian.GetHerHisCap] lessons are tedious and [scoped_guardian.GetSheHe] never lets me play in peace. I think it is time for me to find a better guardian.
Do you want to play a very special game, [scoped_guardian.GetFirstName]?
Nah, I still like [scoped_guardian.GetHerHim] well enough...

[From.GetFirstName] was really insistent about showing me a present [From.GetSheHe] prepared just for me, yet, now that we are alone in [From.GetHerHis] chambers, I do not think following [From.GetHerHim] was such a good idea...
Careful, child, you might get hurt.
I was not born yesterday, you know?
Wait- What are you doing with that? Stop!
It seems I underestimated [From.GetFirstName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] did not fall for my trick and simply scolded me for trying to get [From.GetHerHim] hurt.

It has been some time since anybody at court saw [scoped_guardian.GetTitledFirstName]. The [scoped_guardian.GetManWoman] seems to have vanished without leaving a trace. [FromFrom.GetFirstName], [scoped_guardian.GetFirstName]'s ward, has been pestering me for quite some time about assigning [FromFrom.GetHerHim] to a new guardian.
I will get right on it, child.

Only a few hours after [From.GetHerHis] unfortunate demise, [From.GetFirstName] has joined [From.GetHerHis] traitorous peers in the main hall, fashionably dressed and propped on the long, dusty table, the vacuous gaze of [From.GetHerHis] corpse staring at the empty plates before [From.GetHerHim].
What a charming new guest we have!

It appears that my jailer has a particularly terrible fate in store for me. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] will have my body embalmed after my death and prop it in [From.GetHerHis] own palace like a macabre puppet to scare off [FromFrom.GetHerHis] enemies.
A few well-placed words, mixed with a bit of bribery and coercion are surely all that is needed to obfuscate the validity of some of the vile rumors that my enemies are spreading about me...
I would never raise a hand against my kin!
How could I possibly be a murderer?
How valid can rumors without evidence be?
I will think of some better excuses.
Keeping together this intricate web of lies holding my good reputation is proving to be an increasingly difficult task.
Sometimes I wonder whether my courtiers really believe in the lies I tell them, if I really am as blameless to their eyes as I hope to be, or if instead I am surrounded by smiling enemies.
Keeping all these lies together is quite the challenging task. All this exercise has sharpened my tongue beyond what I thought to be possible.
There is always room for improvement.
People are so gullible! They are all but pawns under my control, for me to push and break as I see fit, incapable of seeing the wolf in sheep's clothing as [Root.GetSheHe] walks amongst them.
I cannot do this anymore! No matter how many people I kill, nobody believes to my accusers. Is the world gone insane?
I have grown bored with [plot_target.GetFirstName]. I think the time has come for me to conclude our delightful game and move onto my next victim.
I wish to wait a bit more.

A mysterious stranger has joined me after tonight's feast. Although [From.GetHerHis] voice sounds familiar, I cannot remember if we have met before in the haze of the dinner. We exchange pleasantries for a while, until a strange feeling makes me shiver, and I suddenly realize that we are alone.

The guest chuckles and welcomes me in a forceful embrace. Something stings me. When I push my assailant away, a stream of blood squirts from my side. The murderer tilts [assassin_plot_owner.GetHerHis] head, smiles, and slashes my throat open with a quick cut of [From.GetHerHis] knife.

I isolate [From.GetFirstName] after a dinner feast. I stalk behind my target as [From.GetSheHe] stumbles through the corridors of the palace in a drunken stupor, and catch [From.GetHerHim] in a cold embrace, plunging my blade through [From.GetHerHis] side. As [From.GetSheHe] turns to scream for help, I cut [From.GetHerHis] throat open.

The guest chuckles and welcomes me in a forceful embrace. Something stings me and I instinctively push [assassin_plot_owner.GetHerHim] away, seeing a stream of blood wetting my clothes already. Looking at my assailant's smile, I finally recognize [assassin_plot_owner.GetHerHim] as [assassin_plot_owner.GetTitledFirstName] and scream [assassin_plot_owner.GetHerHis] name.

I isolate [From.GetFirstName] after a dinner feast. I stalk behind my target as [From.GetSheHe] stumbles through the corridors of the palace in a drunken stupor, and catch [From.GetHerHim] in a cold embrace, plunging my blade through [From.GetHerHis] side. Unfortunately, the [From.GetManWoman] recognizes me and screams my name before I can finish [From.GetHerHim].

My sudden moment of panic passes as quickly as it arrived when one of my courtiers call me from the other side of the corridor. I turn back to invite the strange guest to join us in the hall once again, but [assassin_plot_owner.GetSheHe] has vanished without leaving a trace.

Just as I thought I had finally isolated [From.GetFirstName] to perform my art in peace, one of [From.GetHerHis] drunken friends stumbles upon us in the corridors of [Root.Capital.GetName], forcing me to change my plans.
I just like that, the mood is ruined.

As the guest approaches me with a few comforting words, I notice the dagger [assassin_plot_owner.GetSheHe] is hiding behind [assassin_plot_owner.GetHerHis] back and immediately push [assassin_plot_owner.GetHerHim] away, screaming for my guards. Seeing [assassin_plot_owner.GetHerHis] attempt at murder fail, my assailant flees.

Just as I am about to start my art on [From.GetFirstName], the drunken fool manages to spot my dagger and starts screaming for help. In [From.GetHerHis] desperate counterattack, [From.GetFirstName] manages to wound me, forcing me to abandon my pursuit and flee.

As the guest approaches me with a few comforting words, I notice the dagger [assassin_plot_owner.GetSheHe] is hiding behind [assassin_plot_owner.GetHerHis] back and immediately push [assassin_plot_owner.GetHerHim] on the ground, twisting the blade against [assassin_plot_owner.GetHerHim] and plunging it into [assassin_plot_owner.GetHerHis] chest.

Just as I am about to plunge my dagger through [From.GetHerHis] flesh, [From.GetFirstName] realizes the danger [From.GetSheHe] has gotten [From.GetHerselfHimself] into and reacts with surprising quickness and strength. [From.GetSheHeCap] slams me on the floor and twists my own blade against me, piercing my heart.

A wandering knight has arrived to my court, drawn in by the tales of virtue and bravery surrounding my family name. [invited_character.GetSheHeCap] claims to have traveled far and wide, searching for a liege worth following, and that [invited_character.GetSheHe] wishes to pledge [invited_character.GetHerselfHimself] to my service.
I will give you command of an army.
I am sorry, but my court is full.

A wandering bard has arrived at my court, drawn in by the great tales of valor and honor surrounding my family name. [invited_character.GetSheHeCap] claims that [invited_character.GetSheHe] wishes to pledge [invited_character.GetHerHis] loyalty to me and sing about the great deeds of my dynasty.

I have received a distraught message from a damsel in need. [From.GetTitledFirstName] is suffering under the yoke of an uncouth [From.Liege.GetManWoman] with no honor. Hearing tales of my family's reputation, [From.GetSheHe] pleads me to offer [From.GetHerHim] my protection.
My heart melts at your plea!
Fear not, my [From.GetLordLady]! I will protect you!
Unfortunately, I cannot offer assistance now.
Only through constant practice and innovation can a commander maintain dominance over the battlefield. I must drill my troops regularly if I wish to prevail against my enemies.
We will focus on fighting on foreign territory.
We will try to improve our formations.
We need to reorganize how we deal with supply lines.
Maybe this is not the right time.

All these days spent in the field, shouting orders and hitting things have done wonders to improve my reflexes and endurance, yet they have not been good for my looks. The coarse voice, messy hair and foul stench are making me look more and more like a man than I would like to admit.

All these days spent in the field, shouting orders and hitting things have done wonders to improve my reflexes and endurance, yet they have not been good for my looks. The coarse voice, wavy nose, rough skin and foul stench are making me look more and more like a wild animal than I would like to admit.
I am too important to look like this!
